## **Build Custom Boat Lift – IMM Quality Manufactures**

IMM Quality Boat Lifts ™ has earned its reputation as the leading manufacturer of high-performance boat lift systems by offering a broad array of products engineered to be easier to use, safer to use, and more durable than any other boat lift for sale.

We manufacture three standard lines of boat lifts – the entry-level **Alumavator**, the premium no-maintenance **Platinum**, and the top-of-the-line **Superlift**. These product lines include boat lift configurations for traditional four and eight-piling vertical lifts, elevator, beamless, Trident three pile, boat house, deck lift, jet ski, and kayak lift configurations.

The breadth of our product line and our ability to customize any lift to suit your individual dock and watercraft needs ensures that you can count on us to provide an exceptional lift experience that is built for a lifetime!

Looking for a custom boat lift? Look no further than the team at Build Custom Boat Lift. We can build you a lift that is perfect for your boat and your budget.

Manufacturing 2,000+ American-made Boat Lifts Per Year

[Learn How We Build](https://iqboatlifts.com/how-imm-quality-builds-the-worlds-best-boat-lifts-2/)

Capacities from 4,500 to 320,000 pounds and three choices of drive systems.\\

Capacities from 4,500 to 72,000 pounds and three choices of drive systems. No piling needed.\\

Single PWC, multiple PWC and platform-style options for your dock.\\

Engineered to accommodate the largest yachts on the market, from your dock to the water in no-time.\\

Designed for certain applications where a vertical or elevator is not an option, or when you do not have a dock.\\

Incorporate into a new boathouse design, or we can retrofit your existing boathouse seamlessly\\

## **Why Choose IMM Quality Boat Lifts?**

![titan lift up](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/07/Titan-Lift-Up.webp)

### **Unmatched Manufacturing**

Our comprehensive collection of the most advanced, fully computerized and automated machinery allows us to make virtually any metal part that our engineers design. To guarantee the consistent high product quality and reliability we demand, all structural parts for **[our boatlifts are built in-house](https://iqboatlifts.com/how-imm-quality-builds-the-worlds-best-boat-lifts-2/)** at one of our factories in Fort Myers, FL using these CNC machines.

### **Exceptional Engineering**

IMM Quality Boat Lifts were designed by the largest and most talented engineering department in the industry to outperform the competition in the harsh marine environment. Our **[patented product designs](https://iqboatlifts.com/patented-technology/)** contain countless features, like stepped channel and machined gusset plates, which are innovative improvements that only IMM Quality has the capability to make.

### **Unbeatable Products**

When we began manufacturing boat lifts way back in 1982, we focused on dependability and the highest quality standards. Those values remain at the heart of our business today, which is why we craft our boatlifts and accessories from **[only the finest marine-grade materials](https://iqboatlifts.com/our-commitment/#1)** and offer the most extensive warranty in the industry.

We have over 100,000 boatlifts in the field and some of our older models are still in operation after over 40 years! With this unheard-of track record of quality and trouble-free operation, you can rest assured that IMM Quality Boat Lifts are **[built to last a lifetime.](https://iqboatlifts.com/why-buy-imm-quality/)**

### **Custom Boat Lift Experts**

Our full-service engineering department and tremendous manufacturing capabilities have uniquely positioned IMM Quality to become the custom boat lift experts. Whether it’s the world’s first fully automated marina, under-the-home boat garages, or you simply want a custom-designed bunk system to perfectly match your hull, we have the expertise and experience to manufacture any custom boat lift for your waterfront home.

### **People Who Stand Out**

IMM Quality Boat Lifts was created by the merger of two of the country’s premier boat lift manufacturers, IMM Boat Lifts and Quality Boat Lifts. We take pride in our exemplary reputation along with the exceptional personal customer service that only a **[family-run business](https://iqboatlifts.com/about/)** can deliver. Our engineers, designers, machinists, welders, assemblers and customer support staff have an unparalleled quality of workmanship and their pride and dedication show in every product that leaves our factory.

IMM Quality Boat Lifts are built to last a lifetime, exceeding our customers’ expectations while adhering to world-class engineering standards.

[Request a Quote](https://iqboatlifts.com/boat-lift-quotes/)

# Sitemap

### About

IMM Quality Boat Lifts is the world’s leading manufacturer of aluminum boat lifts, including personal watercraft (PWC), elevator, boathouse, Alumavator, Platinum, Superlift and Titan yacht boat lifts models. Located in Southwest Florida, we design and develop our own boat lifts in-house at our manufacturing facility and ship world-wide. Let our [30+ years of boat lifting experience](https://iqboatlifts.com/history/ "History of IMM Quality Boat Lifts") help you design the perfect lift for your boat, complete with an [industry-leading warranty](https://iqboatlifts.com/why-buy-imm-quality/ "Why Buy Imm Quality"). [Contact us](https://iqboatlifts.com/contact/ "Contact") or use our [dealer locator](https://iqboatlifts.com/dealer-locator/ "Dealer Locator") today.

# **Accessibility Statement**

IMM Quality Boat Lifts and its affiliates are committed to providing an accessible website experience for everyone, including individuals with disabilities, as well as complying with the letter and spirit of the Americans with Disabilities Act of 1990 (“ADA”) and Section 508 of the Rehabilitation Act of 1973.

If you have general questions about the accessibility of IMM Quality Boat Lifts ‘, please contact our web content manager at [webmaster@prioritymarketing.com](mailto:webmaster@prioritymarketing.com). For specific requests regarding accessibility assistance, including reasonable accommodations under Title III of the ADA, the Fair Housing Act, or Section 504 of the Rehabilitation Act and technical assistance, please see below:

# **Reasonable Accommodations**

If you need a reasonable accommodation to access IMM Quality Boat Lifts’ information or services, please email us at [webmaster@prioritymarketing.com](mailto:webmaster@prioritymarketing.com) or call us at **1.866.428.1290** to provide information about the nature of the requested accommodation.  Please include your contact information, such as an email address or telephone number, at which you can be reached.  Depending on the nature of the request, we may need sufficient advance notice to provide a reasonable accommodation.

## **Technical Accessibility Assistance**

In the event that you experience a technical accessibility issue with one of websites, please email us at [webmaster@prioritymarketing.com](mailto:webmaster@prioritymarketing.com) or call us at **239.432.9110** for assistance.  In your communication to us, please specify the nature of the accessibility difficulty, including the web page that may have presented an accessibility challenge.

## **Third-Party Websites**

IMM Quality Boat Lifts’ website may contain links to websites hosted by third parties. Because third-party websites are not owned by us, we cannot make any representations with regard to their accessibility, and we are unable to remediate any accessibility barriers found on those websites.

## **Feedback**

We are always working to ensure that our information and services are accessible to individuals with disabilities.  If you have any ideas for how we could improve the accessibility of our websites, please contact us at [webmaster@prioritymarketing.com](mailto:webmaster@prioritymarketing.com) or call us at **239.432.9110**.

# FAQ with IMM Quality Boat Lifts

## At IMM Quality Boat Lifts, we hear plenty of questions from boating enthusiasts who are looking for the world's best boat lifts. Here are the most common questions that our clients ask about boat lifts for sale.

1\. Why do I want or need a boat lift?

Keeping a boat on a lift will prevent the need for bottom-painting the boat. Bottom painting reduces the value of your boat. You will also save on storage fees, wrapping and winterizing fees, while having year-around availability to launch your boat. Your boatlift will also better protect your boat from storm damage, theft, and vandalism. Most people are surprised to find that installing a boatlift costs much less than they originally figured. In most cases, boatlifts pay for themselves within five years!

READ MORE: [The True Cost of Boat Ownership – What You Need to Know](https://iqboatlifts.com/the-true-cost-of-boat-ownership/)

2\. What capacity lift should I buy?

IMM Quality Boat Lifts are measured by capacity in pounds, rather than the length of the boat. Once you’ve calculated the fully-loaded wet weight of your boat, you can [figure out a boat lift capacity](https://iqboatlifts.com/boat-lift-capacity-calculator/) that will safely handle your boat. You should consider what size boat you may be upgrading to over the next few years before purchasing your lift. If you’re not sure about the weight of your boat, please look at our lift selector on the contact page, or contact us directly at [1-800-545-5603](tel:+18005455603). IMM Quality Boat Lifts for sale can accommodate most any boat, from a PWC to the largest yacht!

READ MORE: [How to Choose the Correct Capacity Lift for Your Boat](https://iqboatlifts.com/how-to-choose-the-correct-capacity-boat-lift-for-your-boat/)

3\. What is better, aluminum lifts or galvanized steel lifts?

In the saltwater environment, marine-grade aluminum (6061-T6) offers a greatly increased life expectancy when compared to galvanized steel. When [aluminum boat lifts](https://iqboatlifts.com/elevator-lifts/alumavator-elevator-lift/) were first introduced, the primary drawback to aluminum has cost. The large structural shapes needed were hard to obtain, increasing boat lift costs. As structural aluminum became more common, the aluminum boat lift cost decreased and is now similar to the price of galvanized lifts. Also, the lightweight properties of aluminum allow the contractors to sometimes install IMM Quality’s boat lifts without a barge or crane, significantly lowering installation costs. Today, there is really no reason to purchase a galvanized boat lift.

4\. Will the cradles on an aluminum lift float?

If a boat lift is selected with wooden bunks, IMM Quality Boat Lifts will send weights to insure that the cradles will not float. IMM Quality Boat Lifts’ revolutionary Perma-Bunk aluminum bunks, which come with white vinyl covers, prevent any cradle-floatation. The aluminum bunks and covers are guaranteed for 10 years. While there are inferior aluminum bunks available, they don’t incorporate a custom extrusion “internal I beam” structure. This piece integrates the white vinyl covers perfectly, without the need for top rivets that might scratch your hull.

5\. When should I use an elevator style boat lift? Are there any drawbacks?

Elevator boat lifts do not require outboard pilings, allowing elevators to be used where outboard pilings are not permitted, in cases with hard-bottom or deep-water conditions that make the installation of piles impractical. Additionally, elevator boat lifts work in cases where there just isn’t enough room to access a traditional four-post boat lift. A disadvantage of elevator boat lifts is that the tracks stay in the water. Therefore, they need to be protected from electrolysis and the ground voltage. Learn more about [How Does an Elevator Lift Work?](https://iqboatlifts.com/how-does-an-elevator-lift-work/)

6\. I need an elevator lift for my application, why choose an IMM Quality elevator?

IMM Quality Boat Lifts is recognized as the industry leader in the manufacturing of [elevator boat lifts](https://iqboatlifts.com/elevator-lifts/). The key to a good elevator boat lift design is the strength of the joint between the trolley and cradle arm. Please see the webpage depicting our elevator lifts for details and pictures. Note how the joint is reinforced, making it the strongest in the industry. Also, you’ll see how the boat lift design also allows you to bring your personal watercraft up closer to the dock than any other elevator lifts for sale. [How Does an Elevator Lift Work?](https://iqboatlifts.com/how-does-an-elevator-lift-work/)

7\. Under what circumstances are beamless boat lifts the better choice?

At first glance, a [beamless boat lift](https://iqboatlifts.com/beamless-lifts/) may seem the better choice because there is no “top beam” to navigate across when entering the boat or to see from the house. While this is true, there is a trade-off for that benefit, tied to how the boat lift works. When winch heads are attached to the sides of the pilings, they exert a side load on the pilings. Therefore, the dock structure and installed pilings (especially external free-standing pilings) need to be installed properly. They also need to have sufficient construction to withstand this sideways force. If not, pilings may tend to lean over, or even shift, due to the side loading. IMM Quality’s conventional top beam boat lifts can be set in a “low-profile” configuration, which allows you to use a covered top beam as a boarding platform while avoiding the side load issues associated with beamless lifts.

8\. What types of drive shaft bearings are best?

There are basically three types of drive shaft bearings to consider.

1. **Ball or roller bearings** may seem great, but they are not durable because of corrosion and because they are not engineered for low-RPM, high-load conditions.
2. Another type is **metal-to-metal.** Some manufacturers use bronze, while some use aluminum or even plastic bearings. In both cases, they require frequent lubrication and maintenance. We feel that a boat lift should free up your time, not use it up with additional chores.
3. Maintenance-free, engineered polymer bearings are a very high-tech, self-lubricating material. IMM Quality Boat Lifts have used these bearings for many years, and our Igus tribopolymer bearings have never worn out. They are dirt-resistant, corrosion-free and quiet, reducing maintenance costs and increasing the service life of our boat lifts.

For these reasons, IMM Quality Boat Lifts uses maintenance-free Igus bearings on all of boat lifts for sale.

9\. What is the lead time for boat lift development?

All IMM Quality Boat Lifts are made in the U.S.A. While the manufacturing process usually requires a 2-3 week period, this timeline may vary based on seasonality and supply chain and this estimate does not include transportation or lift installation. Once your lift is manufactured, it will be transported to your installer. Your installer is responsible for establishing and advising your about a timeline for boat lift installation.

**READ MORE:** [Custom Boat Garage Installation Features Dual Superlift](https://iqboatlifts.com/custom-cape-coral-boat-garage-features-dual-superlifts-by-imm-quality/)

10\. Do I need a permit?

Most jurisdictions require a permit before installing a boat lift. Your contractor will be aware of the requirements and local codes and can easily guide you through the process for how boat lifts work.

11\. I noticed that IMM Quality boat lifts are sold through dealers. Why should I buy from a marine contractor and can I buy direct from the factory?

IMM Quality Boat Lifts strongly recommends that our customers use a [qualified dealer to install their boat lift](https://iqboatlifts.com/dealer-locator/).  Boat lifts are fixed to pilings, docks or seawalls, and require significant skill and experience to install properly. A licensed contractor will be able to handle all aspects of the lift installation, including setting pilings, evaluating existing structures for lift suitability and obtaining the proper permits with the authorities.

However, there may be situations where a homeowner either has a contractor that they are more comfortable with, or can even handle their own installation. IMM Quality Boat Lifts can sell direct under these circumstances. All the risk and liability will be borne to any person self-installing the boat lift, or by a contractor that is not approved by IMM Quality Boat Lifts.

Please let us know if you are already working with a contractor. IMM Quality Boat Lifts always tries to ensure that our approved dealers are providing customers with the highest level of service available, and your feedback is important to us. If you choose to use your own contractor, please be sure to thoroughly check your contractor’s credentials and recent references before entering into a contract.

12\. How do I operate and maintain my boat lift?

Once the boat lift installation is complete, your contractor will train you on the safe operation and maintenance of your new boat lift. If you ever have operational questions, contact IMM Quality Boat Lifts technical staff at [1-800-545-5603](tel:+18005455603). Owner’s Manuals for your specific boat lift are supplied with your lift and are also available in the documentation section of our website.

13\. I’ve seen cheaper boat lifts being made locally and others that are sold over the internet. Why pay more for IMM Quality Boat Lifts?

In short, you get what you pay for. Often, the boat lifts sold over the internet are used. After the downturn in the housing market, people began taking boat lifts from foreclosed properties and reselling them. Sometimes, they are not advertised as used.  Anyone can clean up aluminum nicely and easily with an acid wash. So, be careful that you understand what you are buying and how the boat lifts work. The motors and gearboxes should remain in good functioning order.

In order to undercut the market, some competitors are having their boat lifts manufactured in third-world countries and shipped into the United States for distribution. On the other hand, IMM Quality Boat Lifts are [built to order and manufactured in Fort Myers, Florida](https://iqboatlifts.com/how-imm-quality-builds-the-worlds-best-boat-lifts-2/) in the United States of America. We are proud that our boat lifts are made in the U.S., and we are committed to keeping high-quality jobs in this country.

Many smaller lift manufacturers are little more than garage shops, which may or may not be there when you need parts or service.  The “other guys” will talk about their years of experience in the industry. IMM Quality Boat Lifts has been in business since 1982. We are here to stay. In fact, some of our past competitors have come to work for us!

There is one key difference between IMM Quality Boat Lifts and its competitors. We are the industry’s innovator and our engineers, machinists and fabricators are masters of their trade. IMM Quality’s state-of-the-art, 30,000-square-foot factory and 12,000-square-foot test facility produce and test boat lifts with features and technology unavailable anywhere else. All IMM Quality  Boat Lifts are designed in-house by our experienced engineers and certified by an independent professional engineering firm to exceed industry requirements. IMM Quality Boat Lifts carries product liability insurance that protects your investment. And, we are the industry’s only U.L. approved manufacturer. IMM Quality Boat Lifts has the people, knowledge and commitment to meet your needs, now and into the future.

Copyright © 2025 IMM Quality Boat Lifts

## Boat Lift Insights
[Skip to content](https://iqboatlifts.com/blog/#content "Skip to content")

[Get a Quote](https://iqboatlifts.com/boat-lift-quotes/)

[Call Now 1-800-545-5603](tel:+18005455603)

[![how to prepare your boat and dock for hurricane season](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/03/Image-How-to-Prepare-your-Boat-and-Dock-for-Hurricane-Season.jpg)](https://iqboatlifts.com/how-to-prepare-your-boat-and-dock-for-hurricane-season/)

### [How to Prepare your Boat and Dock for Hurricane Season](https://iqboatlifts.com/how-to-prepare-your-boat-and-dock-for-hurricane-season/)

The key to protecting your boat and home from hurricanes is to get prepared well in advance of any threatening weather. Hurricane season should be

[Read More »](https://iqboatlifts.com/how-to-prepare-your-boat-and-dock-for-hurricane-season/)

# BOAT LIFT DEVELOPMENT FACILITIES

## **State-of-the-Art Boat Lift Development Facilities**

IMM Quality Boat Lifts utilizes only the best boat lift equipment and machinery availableat our boat lift development facilities. To achieve this, we constantly upgrade production and our testing equipment. We stay current with the latest machining technology and are constantly testing new tooling, inserts and CAD/CAM programs. Our boat lift equipment for sale is both reliable and built to last a lifetime. And, we have the necessary experience to make a wide variety of meticulous, detail-oriented boat lift equipment repairs.

### For questions about our boat lift development facilities, please call (800) 545-5603.

**CNC Machining Centers** 2 Haas VF-3 Vertical Machining Centers (X 40”, Y 20”, Z 25”)

Haas VF-4 Vertical Machining Centers (X 50”, Y 30”, Z 25”)

All equipped with 4th axis and rotary indexer. VF-4 equipped with automatic pallet changer and Renishaw tool probe and measuring system.

**CNC Turning Centers**

Haas SL 30 CNC Lathe with 16” turning diameter, 30” swing and 39” machining length

**CNC Router**

Multi Cam MG Series (X 5’, Y 16’, Z 16”)

**CNC Punch**

Geka Puma 55 hydraulic punching machine (punching power: 60 tons, Max. Capacity: 1 ½” x ⅜”, Throat: 19 ⅝ 29 ½ )

**Milling Machine**

Bridgeport Series I with power feed and digital readout (9” by 52” table)

**Engine Lathe**

Precision Mathews PM-1660LB (16” swing and 60” center on center capacity)

**Plasma Cutter**

Multi Cam 3000 series plasma cutter (5’ x 9’)

**Saws**

Hydmech S-20A automatic scissor style CNC band saw (12” x 14” x 30’, 10,000 lbs for auto-feed)

FMB Zeus automatic feed, 0° band saw (10” x 10” x 30’)

FMB Pegasus automatic mitre band saw (13” x 20” x 30’)

FMB Triton automatic mitre band saw (10” x 10” x 30’)

**Ironworkers**

Piranha PII65 punch / sheer / brake / coper / notcher (65 ton hydraulic pressure, 20” shear by ¾” thickness)

2 Uni Hydro Ironworkers (56 ton hydraulic pressure, 14” shear, 9” brake)

**Miscellaneous**

2 Oster 792A Threading Machines

4 Powermatic drill press

Clausing Iburmia drill press

Birmingham NU-4816 box and pan brake

All Miller machines for all welding processes

Pipe Bender

Ewald flash cable cutter and fuser

## Manufacturing IMM Quality Boat Lifts

In 2008, two of the country’s premier boat lift manufacturers, IMM Boat Lifts and Quality Boat Lifts, merged their operations. This created the world’s largest and leading boat lift manufacturer, IMM Quality Boat Lifts.

IMM Quality Boat Lifts has been family-owned and operated since inception, with more than three generations of fabricating experience and engineering knowledge. We manufacture our full line of boat lift products at our state-of-the-art facilities in Fort Myers, Florida. Our longevity in business and unmatched warranty are testament to our claim that we manufacture the world’s best boat lifts.

## **The Best Boat Lifts Manufacturer in the World!**

At first glance, different brands of lifts may look similar, but upon closer inspection you will find that IMM Quality Boat Lifts are built better than all the rest. IMM Quality Boat Lifts is committed to manufacturing boat lifts that are safe, long-lasting, dependable, easy-to-use and aesthetically pleasing. We are dedicated to developing products that exceed our customer’s expectations while adhering to [world-class engineering standards](https://iqboatlifts.com/how-imm-quality-builds-the-worlds-best-boat-lifts-2/). In keeping with this commitment, we use only the very best materials and manufacturing techniques. Dependability was key when we built our first lift way back in 1982, and it still is today. You cannot get higher quality or better value anywhere else in the boat lift industry.

From personal watercraft to full custom designs for the largest yachts, our customers can depend upon IMM Quality Boat Lifts products being exceptionally engineered, thoroughly tested, and built like no other lift for years of trouble-free use.

## We Make The Best Boat Lift

Our **longevity in business** and **unmatched warranty** are testaments to our claim that IMM Quality Boatlifts is the best manufacturer of boatlifts for your dock.

From the engineers who develop the patented, custom designs to the ASW D1.2 **aluminum certified welders** to the **skilled machinists** and to our **customer support staff**, our pride and dedication show in every product that leaves our factory.

Dependable, patented, unsurpassed design, top-notch service and most of all, built like no other for **years of trouble-free use**.

You can find all types of IMM Quality Boatlifts and featured products at many [boat shows](https://www.boatshowmarketplace.com/exhibitor/imm-quality-boatlifts) around the country!

![Superlift boat lift by IMM Quality holds white and blue yacht](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/Superlift.jpg)

At first glance, different brands of boat lifts may look similar, but upon closer inspection, you will find that our boat lifts are built better than all the rest. We can stand behind our products because we employ the best engineers, designers, welders, and assemblers to ensure that we only manufacture top-of-the-line boatlifts and accessories.

#### **Components**

Our platinum drives were engineered specifically for the marine lift environment and are the finest direct drive system on the market. Along with the battle-tested chain drive and the out-of-this-world performance of our cycloidal gearless drives, your IMM Quality Boat Lifts manufacturer offers the fastest, most powerful and most reliable line-up of drives in the industry. In addition to marine lift industry standard motor controls, we manufacture our own variable frequency controls to provide soft start and stop along with smartphone integration, another industry first for IMM Quality Boat Lifts. With American-made heavy duty electric motors and in-house fabrication of all other boatlift components, IMM Quality Boat Lifts for sale will provide long-lasting, service-free performance.

#### **Construction**

Our IMM Quality Boat Lifts manufacturing factory sources only the highest quality raw materials, such as marine-grade 6061-T6 aluminum and type 300 stainless steel. To maintain control of boatlift quality and reliability, all parts for our boatlifts are built in-house. This meticulous work takes place in our fabrication department by skilled craftsman, who use state-of-the-art CNC machines. Our welded construction technique is a far superior method for the corrosive marine environment. We have over 25,000 boatlifts in the field and some of our older models are still in operation after over 40 years! With this unheard of track record of quality and trouble-free operation, you can rest assured that IMM Quality Boatlifts are built for a lifetime.

#### **Design**

IMM Quality Boat Lifts’ engineers have developed patented and custom designs to far exceed the performance of any other boatlift on the market. Our boatlift cradles can be custom designed to fit the boat manufacturer’s recommended bunk placement. Fully customized services are available to design perfectly sized and equipped boatlifts for any need. Our intelligent designs provide the lowest cost of ownership among any boat lift on the market, along with unsurpassed durability to give you peace of mind about costly and time-consuming repairs.

#### **Boat Lift Warranty**

IMM Quality Boat Lifts offers up to a 15-year warranty on our structures, 5-year warranty on all of our drives, and a 2-year warranty on all other components, including the sheaves and motors. For full details for all types of IMM Quality Boatlifts, please review the warranty. All IMM Quality Boatlifts for sale are protected by the most comprehensive products liability insurance available on the market.

IMM Quality Boat Lifts has consistently embraced innovation to provide the best designs, top quality and highest reliability.

# Boat lifts IN Maryland   IMM Quality Boat Lifts

### **Looking for Boat Lifts in Maryland?**

Maryland is one of the original 13 states. While small, it contains much diverse terrain from the low-lying and water-oriented eastern shore and Chesapeake Bay area, through the metropolitan hurly-burly of Baltimore, its capital city, to the Appalachian foothills and mountains of its western reaches.

[IMM Quality Boat Lifts](https://iqboatlifts.com/about/) understands your boatlift requirements and challenges. Our engineering department builds custom boat lifts specific to your requirements. We offer a variety of boat lifts made from marine-grade aluminum and built to last. Backed by more than 40 years of experience in this industry, our patented engineering designs are the most reliable and easy-to-use boat lifts that you can find. Manufactured locally in our Fort Myers, FL factory, we are proud to be made in the USA.

## Order Boat Lifts in Maryland

While our lifts are shipped around the world, it is always a comfort to know that we can meet the needs of our customers in the Maryland area. No matter what type of watercraft you own and what shoreline conditions exist at your home or business, IMM Quality Boat Lifts will build you a lift that perfectly suits your lifestyle. That is why our boat lifts are the preferred choice of discerning customers and have an unsurpassed reputation.

![Google map of boat lifts in Baltimore MD](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/boat-lifts-maryland.jpg)

# BOAT LIFT ACCESSORIES

At first glance, different brands of boat lift accessories may look similar, but they are _not_ created equal. Upon closer inspection, you will find that the high-performance boat lift accessories engineered by **IMM Quality Boat Lifts** are built better than all the rest. We are committed to manufacturing boat lift accessories from the finest, most durable materials. After all, your boat lift system should be dependable, easy-to-use and aesthetically pleasing.

If you have any questions about IMM Quality Boat Lifts accessories, call us toll-free at [**1-800-545-5603**](tel:+18005455603) and one of our experienced sales technicians will be happy to assist you find the products you need. You will not find higher quality boat lift accessories – or a better value – anywhere else in the boat lift industry. You can depend upon IMM Quality boat accessories being exceptionally engineered, thoroughly tested, and crafted for years of trouble-free use.

[![Working With Boat Lift Manufacturers resulted in custom bunks on this titan yacht lift](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/cache/2019/10/Working-with-Boat-Lift-Manufacturers/3984721671.jpg)](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/Working-with-Boat-Lift-Manufacturers.jpg)

## Get Boat Lift Accessories Quote

Our product lines offer a variety of standard and customizable options to suit the budget and specific needs of virtually any boat owner. To request an estimate, please fill out the form below to be connected with a [local boat lift dealer near you](https://iqboatlifts.com/dealer-locator/). Your local boat lift dealer will reach out to you within two business days to provide the information you requested.

**Lift Selector (Optional Fields)** To find the right lift, tell us a little bit about your boat and dock situation. If you need help finding the weight and dimensions of your boat, please consult the on-line NADA guidebook, or you may call us directly at 1-800-545-5603. If your boat will not be centered on your lift, please contact technical support and they will advise you on your proposed weight distribution to make sure you are not overloading the lift. [Click here for NADA Guides on used boats](https://www.nadaguides.com/Boats?custID=12060)

## Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) about Boat Lift Accessories

What makes IMM Quality Boat Lifts' accessories stand out?

They are engineered for high performance, built from durable materials, and designed to be dependable, easy-to-use, and aesthetically pleasing.

What types of accessories are available?

Accessories include Alumavator drives, aluminum bunks, auto-stop limit switches, custom controls, gearboxes, and more, each designed to enhance the functionality and durability of boat lifts.

Can I customize accessories for my boat lift?

Yes, IMM offers customizable options like custom bunks, cradles, guide rollers, and yacht bunk systems to meet specific needs.

How do I get a quote for boat lift accessories?

You can fill out a form on the website to be connected with a local boat lift dealer who will provide information based on your needs.

Are there any unique accessories I should consider?

Unique options include solar power upgrade kits, stainless steel motors, and tide mooring accessories, each offering specific benefits to enhance your boat lift system.

## Boat Lifts in Jupiter
[Skip to content](https://iqboatlifts.com/jupiter-fl/#content "Skip to content")

[Call Now 1-800-545-5603](tel:+18005455603)

# Boat lifts IN Jupiter, FL -   IMM Quality Boat Lifts

### **Looking for Boat Lifts in Jupiter, FL?**

![Google map of boat lifts in Jupiter FL](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/02/jupiter-fl-imm-quality-boat-lifts.png)

Jupiter is a town on the southeastern coast of Florida. On a hill overlooking the Loxahatchee River, the red 1860 Jupiter Inlet lighthouse offers panoramic views. The site also has a preserved pioneer-era homestead and a museum devoted to regional history, housed in a WWII U.S. Navy building.

Nearby Jupiter Beach faces the Atlantic Ocean. Running along the beachfront, Carlin Park has playgrounds and tennis courts. Regardless of where you live in Jupiter, [IMM Quality Boat Lifts](https://iqboatlifts.com/about/) understands your island city’s boatlift requirements and challenges.

IMM Quality Boat Lifts brings [the world’s best boat lifts](https://iqboatlifts.com/boats-lifts/) to Jupiter, FL. IMM Quality Boat Lifts offers a variety of boat lifts made from marine grade aluminum that are built to last. Backed by more than 35 years of experience in this industry, our patented engineering designs are the most reliable and easy to use boat lifts that you can find. Manufactured locally in our Fort Myers, Florida factory, we are proud to be made in America.

Boat Lifts for Sale in Jupiter, FL

While our lifts are shipped around the world, it is always a comfort to know that we can meet the needs of our customers in the Jupiter area. No matter what type of watercraft you own and what shoreline conditions exist at your home or business, IMM Quality Boat Lifts will build you a lift that perfectly suits your lifestyle. That is why our boat lifts are the preferred choice of discerning customers and have an unsurpassed reputation.

### [BoatHouse Lifts](https://iqboatlifts.com/boat-house-lifts/)

# Boat lifts IN Greenville NC-   IMM Quality Boat Lifts

### **Looking for Boat Lifts in Greenville, NC?**

![Google map of Boat Lifts in Greenville NC](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/02/greenville-nc-imm-quality-boat-lifts.png)

Greenville is widely recognized as the cultural, educational, economic and medical hub of eastern North Carolina. While retaining its Southern charm, Greenville has grown into the 10th largest city in the state and is now a thriving, small metropolitan city of more than 90,000 in the heart of Pitt County with a population of nearly 175,000 residents.

Regardless of where you live in Greenville, [IMM Quality Boat Lifts](https://iqboatlifts.com/about/) understands your island city’s boatlift requirements and challenges. IMM Quality Boat Lifts brings [the world’s best boat lifts](https://iqboatlifts.com/boats-lifts/) to Greenville, NC.

IMM Quality Boat Lifts offers a variety of boat lifts made from marine-grade aluminum that are built to last. Backed by more than 35 years of experience in this industry, our patented engineering designs are the most reliable and easy-to-use boat lifts that you can find. Manufactured locally in our Fort Myers, Florida factory, we are proud to be made in America.

## Order Boat Lifts in Greenville, NC

While our lifts are shipped around the world, it is always a comfort to know that we can meet the needs of our customers in the Greenville area. No matter what type of watercraft you own and what shoreline conditions exist at your home or business, IMM Quality Boat Lifts will build you a lift that perfectly suits your lifestyle. That is why our boat lifts are the preferred choice of discerning customers and have an unsurpassed reputation.

## IMM Quality Manufactures

Our comprehensive collection of the most advanced, fully computerized and automated machinery allows us to make virtually any metal part that our engineers design.

![boat icon](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/boat_icon.webp)

## Unbeatable   Products

When we began manufacturing boat lifts way back in 1982, we focused on dependability and the highest quality standards. Those values remain at the heart of our business.

![experts icon](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/experts_icon.webp)

## Custom Boat Lift Experts

Our full-service engineering department and tremendous manufacturing capabilities have uniquely positioned IMM Quality to become the custom boat lift experts.

![imm boat lifts](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/IMM_boat_lifts.webp)

# Build Custom Boat Lift

IMM Quality Boat Lifts ™ has earned its reputation as the leading manufacturer of high-performance boat lift systems by offering a broad array of products engineered to be easier to use, safer to use, and more durable than any other boat lift for sale.

We manufacture three standard lines of boat lifts – the entry-level **Alumavator**, the premium no-maintenance **Platinum**, and the top-of-the-line **Superlift**. These product lines include boat lift configurations for traditional four and eight-piling vertical lifts, elevator, beamless, Trident three pile, boat house, deck lift, jet ski, and kayak lift configurations.

The breadth of our product line and our ability to customize any lift to suit your individual dock and watercraft needs ensures that you can count on us to provide an exceptional lift experience that is built for a lifetime!

## Looking for a Custom Boat Lift?

Look no further than the team at Build Custom Boat Lift. We can build you a lift that is perfect for your boat and your budget.

[Get In Touch](https://iqboatlifts.com/boat-lift-quotes/)

I would highly recommend that anyone looking to buy a new one or replace their boat lift, talk to IMM Quality Boat Lifts. ## Patented Boat Lift Technologies
[Skip to content](https://iqboatlifts.com/patented-technology/#content "Skip to content")

[Call Now 1-800-545-5603](tel:+18005455603)

# Patented Boat Lift Technologies

There are a number of patented boat lift technologies that have combined to make IMM Quality Boat Lifts the industry’s top innovation leader. First, we take feedback from our customers very seriously, because they know best what is convenient for them and what features make the best boat lift experience. Combined with over three generations of experience, we know which features and materials will make the best boat lifts. Secondly, our technical expertise is unmatched in the industry. Our IQ engineers are not just design experts, they are scientists, and as such, they are continuously testing new technologies and designs to build better products. Thirdly, in addition to greater process control and the ability to make all parts in-house, our advanced manufacturing equipment allows us to modify existing parts and build novel parts easily. Finally, our on-site product design testing facilities and rigorous scientific methods guarantee that these innovations don’t just look great on paper – they will exceed the performance expectations of our demanding engineers in the real world.

All of these factors have resulted in dozens of patents and many more innovative design features. Take a look at any design feature on any boat lift. Chances are IMM Quality Boat Lifts patented it or designed the feature and brought it to market.

### Boat Lift Innovations from IMM Quality Include:

- Step channel to eliminate shear loads on the bearing block weld
- Roto molded covers for motor and drive
- Custom extrusions for bearing block, pulleys and other parts to improve manufacturing tolerances
- Cycloidal gearless drives
- Wedge Lock
- Maintenance free bushings, bearings and pulleys
- Heavy duty non-marring white vinyl designed to fit perfectly into our custom bunk extrusion
- Screw adjustable stanchions
- Reinforced gusset plates
- Cable keepers
- Cable rollers
- Grooved winders
- Electro-plated Gatorshield tubing
- Variable frequency programmable logic controllers with soft start and stop, self-leveling and multiple stop point settings
- Smart phone integration into controls

## **While all the other boat lift manufacturers try to play catch up with our patented boat lift technologies, IMM Quality Boat Lifts continues to lead the field.**

# Boat lifts in Sebastian -   IMM Quality Boat Lifts

### **Looking for Boat Lifts in Sebastian, FL?**

![Google map of boat lifts in Sebastian, FL](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/02/sebastian-fl-imm-quality-boat-lifts.png)

The city of Sebastian, Florida is located in Indian River County. You will find it approximately midway through the east coast of the Florida Peninsula, between Melbourne and Vero Beach in an area known as the Treasure Coast. It is recognized as the home of Pelican Island, the first designated wildlife refuge in the United States; a Millennium City and a Tree City, USA.

Regardless of where you live in Sebastian, [IMM Quality Boat Lifts](https://iqboatlifts.com/about/) understands your island city’s boatlift requirements and challenges. IMM Quality Boat Lifts brings [the world’s best boat lifts](https://iqboatlifts.com/boats-lifts/) to Sebastian, FL.

IMM Quality Boat Lifts offers a variety of boat lifts made from marine-grade aluminum that are built to last. Backed by more than 35 years of experience in this industry, our patented engineering designs are the most reliable and easy-to-use boat lifts that you can find.

## Order Boat Lifts in Sebastian, FL

Manufactured locally in our Fort Myers, Florida factory, we are proud to be made in America. While our lifts are shipped around the world, it is always a comfort to know that we can meet the needs of our customers in the Sebastian area.

No matter what type of watercraft you own and what shoreline conditions exist at your home or business, IMM Quality Boat Lifts will build you a lift that perfectly suits your lifestyle. That is why our boat lifts are the preferred choice of discerning customers and have an unsurpassed reputation.

Saco is a city in York County, Maine, United States. The population was 18,482 at the 2010 census. It is home to Ferry Beach State Park, Funtown Splashtown USA, and, Thornton Academy, as well as General Dynamics Armament Systems, a subsidiary of the defense contractor General Dynamics.

Regardless of where you live in Saco, [IMM Quality Boat Lifts](https://iqboatlifts.com/about/) understands your island city’s boatlift requirements and challenges. IMM Quality Boat Lifts brings [the world’s best boat lifts](https://iqboatlifts.com/boats-lifts/) to Saco, ME.

## Specialty Boat Lifts
[Skip to content](https://iqboatlifts.com/specialty-lifts/#content "Skip to content")

[Get a Quote](https://iqboatlifts.com/boat-lift-quotes/)

[Call Now 1-800-545-5603](tel:+18005455603)

# Specialty Boat Lifts

Specialty boat lifts are designed for certain applications where the standard vertical or elevator boat lift is not the most appropriate method of lift, due to restrictions or personal preferences.

IMM Quality Boat Lifts currently manufactures three types of specialty boat lifts. Each one is unique to a specific application. The **Trident** specialty boat lift is a three-post lift designed to comply with triangular riparian setback limitations. The Trident specialty boat lifts allow easy navigation in and out of the boat slip. The **Beamless** specialty boat lift is preferred by many homeowners, because there are no upper lifting beams to duck under or step over when accessing the boat. Another advantage to not having an upper lifting beam is that there is no obstruction of the waterway view. Finally, the **Marine Railway** is ideal for beach access or other gradual slope conditions where there are no deep water docks or seawalls. This unique type of specialty boat lift is often used to pull boats or seaplanes onto dry land, into boat houses or inside garages. To read further about IMM Quality _**Specialty Boat Lifts**_, click on the labeled navigation tabs in the dropdown menus above or on the images below.

[![Specialty Boat Lifts marine railway lift on Rose Key](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20800%20599'%3E%3C/svg%3E)](https://iqboatlifts.com/marine-railway/)

### [Marine Railway Boat Lifts](https://iqboatlifts.com/marine-railway/)

[![kitzen beamless decked 2 lum](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20800%20600'%3E%3C/svg%3E)](https://iqboatlifts.com/beamless/)

### [Beamless Boat Lifts](https://iqboatlifts.com/beamless/)

[![trident lift](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20500%20376'%3E%3C/svg%3E)](https://iqboatlifts.com/trident/)

## [Trident Specialty Boat Lifts](https://iqboatlifts.com/trident/)

Our product lines offer a variety of standard and customizable options to suit the budget and specific needs of virtually any boat owner. To request an estimate, please fill out the form below to be connected with a [local boat lift dealer near you](https://iqboatlifts.com/dealer-locator/). Your local boat lift dealer will reach out to you within two business days to provide the information you requested.

## Quality Boat Lifts

# High-Quality Boat Lifts for Safe and Easy Watercraft Storage

## Best Boat Lifts in The USA

Built to last a lifetime, IMM Quality Boat Lifts are superbly engineered by a highly trained, in-house team of the best and brightest minds in the industry. We use the latest 3D modeling and structural analysis software, making all parts in our fabrication factory. And, our machine work is completed on fully computerized machines, which guarantees consistent high quality. Choose from vertical lifts, elevator boat lifts, jet ski lifts or any special boat lift you may need. Browse our catalog to find the right product for your needs.

Our company has set the standard in top-quality manufacturing boat lifts. Our engineering department can make your dream come true as we have done many times before, producing the most amazing boat lifts that have been sent through the United States, to the fjords in Norway or the shores of Dubai.

### **Vertical Boat Lifts**

The most efficient cable-drawn lift, IMM Quality vertical boat lifts were developed a couple of decades ago and have become the industry standard. The IMM Quality vertical boat lift can be recognized by its parallel upper beams that each contain a motor driven shaft through their length on which four cables are wound.

### **Elevator Boat Lifts**

IMM Quality elevator boat lifts are ideal for restricted waterfronts where outboard pilings are not allowed, such as on narrow canals, or where the driving of pilings is difficult due to hard bottom conditions.

### **PWC Jetski Lifts**

IMM Quality offers three choices of personal watercraft jetski lifts, which are available with mounts for seawall, dock and piling installations.

### **Specialty Boat Lifts**

Specialty boat lifts are designed for certain applications where the standard vertical or elevator boat lift is not the most appropriate method of lift, often due to restrictions or personal preferences. IMM Quality Boat Lifts currently manufactures three types of specialty boat lifts, each one unique to a specific application.

## Vertical

Capacities from **4,500 to 200,000** pounds and three choices of drive systems.

[View More](https://iqboatlifts.com/vertical-lifts/)

## Elevator

Capacities from **4,500 to 30,000** pounds and three choices of drive systems. No piling needed.

[View More](https://iqboatlifts.com/elevator-lifts/)

[**PWC Lifts \| Jetski**\\
\\
**Single PWC, Multiple PWC and Platform Style Options** for your dock. \\
\\
View More](https://iqboatlifts.com/pwc-jetski-lifts/)

## Titan

Engineered **to accommodate the largest yachts on the market,** from your dock to the water in no-time.

[View More](https://iqboatlifts.com/titan-yacht-lifts/)

## Special Cases

Designed for certain applications where a vertical or elevator is not an option, or when you do not have a dock.

[View More](https://iqboatlifts.com/specialty-lifts/)

## Boat House

We can retrofit your existing original boathouse seamlessly with our systems of custom welding and mounting.

[View More](https://iqboatlifts.com/boat-house-lifts/)

## About

IMM Quality Boat Lifts is the world’s leading manufacturer of boatlifts, including personal watercraft (PWC), elevator, boathouse, Alumavator, Platinum, Superlift and Titan yacht boat lifts models. Located in Southwest Florida, we design and develop our own boat lifts in-house at our manufacturing facility and ship world-wide. Let our [30+ years of boat lifting experience](https://iqboatlifts.com/history/ "History of IMM Quality Boat Lifts") help you design the perfect lift for your boat, complete with an [industry-leading warranty](https://iqboatlifts.com/why-buy-imm-quality/ "Why Buy Imm Quality"). [Contact us](https://iqboatlifts.com/ "Contact") or use our [dealer locator](https://iqboatlifts.com/dealer-locator/ "Dealer Locator") today.

## Frequently Asked Question (FAQs) about Boat Lifts

What types of boat lifts does IMM Quality Boat Lifts offer?

IMM Quality Boat Lifts offers a diverse range of boat lifts including vertical lifts, elevator boat lifts, personal watercraft (PWC) jet ski lifts, and specialty boat lifts. Each type is designed to meet different needs and conditions, ensuring there is a suitable lift for various boat sizes and waterfront restrictions.

What makes IMM Quality vertical boat lifts stand out in the industry?

The IMM Quality vertical boat lifts are recognized for their efficiency and have become the industry standard. These lifts feature parallel upper beams that contain a motor-driven shaft running through their length, on which four cables are wound. Developed decades ago, these lifts are designed for durability and ease of use.

Are there any boat lifts suitable for restricted waterfronts?

Yes, IMM Quality elevator boat lifts are ideal for restricted waterfronts where outboard pilings are prohibited or in locations with hard bottom conditions that make driving pilings difficult. These lifts provide a practical solution for narrow canals and similar challenging environments.

Can IMM Quality Boat Lifts customize a lift for unique applications?

Absolutely! IMM Quality Boat Lifts specializes in custom-engineered solutions to accommodate specific applications where standard vertical or elevator lifts are not suitable. Whether due to personal preferences or physical restrictions at the installation site, their engineering department can create a lift tailored to the unique requirements of any client.

How does IMM Quality Boat Lifts ensure the quality and reliability of their products?

IMM Quality Boat Lifts uses the latest 3D modeling and structural analysis software to design their lifts, which are then manufactured in their own fabrication factory. All machine work is completed on fully computerized machines, ensuring consistent high quality across all products. Additionally, with over 30 years of experience in boat lifting, they provide an industry-leading warranty for their boat lifts.

## Trident Boat Lifts
[Skip to content](https://iqboatlifts.com/trident-lift/#content "Skip to content")

[Get a Quote](https://iqboatlifts.com/boat-lift-quotes/)

[Call Now 1-800-545-5603](tel:+18005455603)

# Trident Boat Lifts

IMM Quality Boat Lift’s engineers came up with the innovative Trident boat lift, a 3-pole design, in consultation with marine contractors and homeowners.

Trident boat lifts are ideally suited for the ends of canals where waterway rights are limited to pie-shaped wedges. The Trident boatlift and its 3-pole design satisfies triangular riparian setback limitations and allows maximum slip utilization with easy navigation in and out of the slip. All Trident boat lifts for sale are powered by the Platinum drive, an aluminum double worm transmission, for a maintenance-free direct drive-to-shaft connection. Furthermore, the Trident boat lift is available with a double speed drive, making IMM Quality’s superiority all the more pronounced.

IMM Quality Boat Lifts takes pride in our engineering and product design expertise. We also bring the unique capability to thoroughly performance test our Trident boatlifts before they leave our factory. Take a look at the Trident lift design, and see why IMM Quality Boat Lifts are built for a lifetime.

[Click Here to See a Figure of Trident Boat Lifts Features](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/02/Trident.pdf)

## **Trident Boat Lifts Standard Features**

- All type 6061-T6 aluminum and type 300 stainless steel construction
- Our custom aluminum bunks, covered in white vinyl, are guaranteed not to float. They are covered by a 10-year warranty against tearing, fading, mold and corrosion
- Heavy-duty, rotomolded cover encloses powerheads to extend product life by protecting the mechanical and electrical components from windblown rain and salt spray
- Grooved aluminum cable winders with cable keepers
- Custom extruded top beam step channel adds structural support for the drive bearing blocks
- Maintenance-free aluminum pulleys with unique self-lubricating bearing
- Maintenance-free aluminum bearing blocks with no-lube Igus bushings
- Stainless steel aircraft grade cables
- No underwater load bearing cable tie offs
- No complex cable routing
- Stainless steel hardware
- Heavy-duty reinforced guide post base with PVC-covered guide post that are easily adjustable
- Gem remote control with handheld transmitter enables in-water operation of your Trident boat lift
- Maintenance-free double worm direct drive

## **Options**

- High-speed version is twice as fast
- Walk boards
- Steps
- Stern platforms
- Top beam cover
- Tide guides
- Remote upgrades to allow auto stops and lighting control
- Solar power

## **Trident Boat Lifts**

## **Specifications**

The _**Trident Boat Lift**_ is available in four sizes, at 7,000, 10,000, 13,000 and 16,000 pounds.

# Boat lifts in Barnstable, MA

Are you in search of reliable boat lifts in Barnstable, Massachusetts? Look no further. We specialize in providing premium marine lifts designed to safeguard your valuable vessels and elevate your boating experience. With years of experience and a commitment to excellence, we are your trusted source for boat lifts in Barnstable.

## **Why Choose Our Boat Lifts in Barnstable, MA**

Our boat lifts offer numerous advantages for boat owners in Barnstable:

**1\. Premium Quality:** We take pride in offering boat lifts built to withstand the challenging marine conditions of Barnstable. Our products are crafted using high-quality materials.

**2\. Customized Solutions:** We understand that each boat is unique. That’s why we offer tailor-made boat lift solutions to perfectly accommodate your specific vessel, ensuring a precise fit.

**3\. Expert Installation:** Our team of experienced professionals is dedicated to installing your boat lift with precision and efficiency, providing you with peace of mind.

**4\. Durability and Longevity:** Our boat lifts are engineered for long-term durability, ensuring your investment remains well-protected for years to come.

**5\. Local Expertise:** With our strong presence in Barnstable, we possess invaluable knowledge of the local waterways and conditions, making us the go-to choice for boat lifts.

Ready to enhance your boating experience in Barnstable, MA? Don’t hesitate to get in touch with us today. Our team is here to answer your inquiries, provide quotes, and assist you in finding the perfect boat lift solution for your needs. [Request a Quote](https://iqboatlifts.com/boat-lift-quotes/)

## **Looking for Boat Lifts in Barnstable, MA?![boat lifts in barnstable, ma](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%201024%20766'%3E%3C/svg%3E)**

Barnstable, also referred to as the Town of Barnstable, is located in the state of Massachusetts. It is the county seat of Barnstable County. Barnstable is the largest community, both in land area and population, on Cape Cod. At the 2010 census, it had a population of 45,193. Regardless of where you live in Barnstable, IMM Quality Boat Lifts understands your island city’s boatlift requirements and challenges.

IMM Quality Boat Lifts provides the world’s best boat lifts in Barnstable MA. Neighborhoods we serve include:

- Osterville
- City Center
- Centerville
- Cotuit at Marstons Mills
- Hyannis Port at West Hyannisport
- Shootflying Hill Rd at Iyannough Rd.
- Newtown at Pondsville
- Old Stage Rd. and Skunknet Rd.

[IMM Quality Boat Lifts](https://iqboatlifts.com/about/) offers a variety of boat lifts made from marine-grade aluminum that are built to last. Backed by more than 35 years of experience in this industry, our patented engineering designs are the most reliable and easy to use boat lifts in Barnstable, MA that you can find. Manufactured locally in our Fort Myers, Florida factory, we are proud to be made in America.

### Order Boat Lifts in Barnstable, MA

While our lifts are shipped around the world, it is always a comfort to know that we can meet the needs of our customers in the Barnstable area. No matter what type of watercraft you own and what shoreline conditions exist at your home or business, IMM Quality Boat Lifts will build you a lift that perfectly suits your lifestyle. That is why our boat lifts are the preferred choice of discerning customers and have an unsurpassed reputation.

# Boat lifts IN Melbourne -   IMM Quality Boat Lifts

### **Looking for Boat Lifts in Melbourne, FL?**

![Google map of boat lifts in Melbourne FL](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/02/melbourne-fl-imm-quality-boat-lifts.png)

The city of Melbourne is located in southern Brevard County, southeast of Orlando on Florida’s east coast. It sits astride the Indian River Lagoon, with a large portion of the city located on Florida’s mainland, and a portion located on a barrier island. The Indian River Lagoon separates the mainland from the beach side barrier island.

Regardless of where you live in Fort Pierce, [IMM Quality Boat Lifts](https://iqboatlifts.com/about/) understands your island city’s boatlift requirements and challenges. IMM Quality Boat Lifts brings the world’s best boat lifts to Melbourne, FL.

IMM Quality Boat Lifts offers a [variety of boat lifts](https://iqboatlifts.com/boats-lifts/) made from marine-grade aluminum that are built to last. Backed by more than 35 years of experience in this industry, our patented engineering designs are the most reliable and easy to use boat lifts that you can find.

## Boat Lifts for Sale in Melbourne, FL

Manufactured locally in our Fort Myers, Florida factory, we are proud to be made in America. While our lifts are shipped around the world, it is always a comfort to know that we can meet the needs of our customers in the Melbourne area.

No matter what type of watercraft you own and what shoreline conditions exist at your home or business, IMM Quality Boat Lifts will build you a lift that perfectly suits your lifestyle. That is why our boat lifts are the preferred choice of discerning customers and have an unsurpassed reputation.

# Boat lifts IN Southport -   IMM Quality Boat Lifts

### **Looking for Boat Lifts in Southport, NC?**

![Google map of boat lifts in Southport NC](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/02/southport-nc-imm-quality-boat-lifts.png)

Southport is located on the coast in Southeastern North Carolina, where the Cape Fear River meets the Atlantic Ocean. Southport has been hailed by North Carolina locals and visitors alike as one of the most authentic and unique coastal communities along the shoreline.

It doesn’t take long for newcomers to figure out why. The small, 2.2-square-mile village is a stunning combination of historic residences, lush coastal landscaping and miles of water in every direction. This makes it both a quintessentially southern and maritime community with a distinct culture all its own.

Regardless of where you live in Southport, [IMM Quality Boat Lifts](https://iqboatlifts.com/about/) understands your city’s boatlift requirements and challenges. IMM Quality Boat Lifts brings [the world’s best boat lifts](https://iqboatlifts.com/boats-lifts/) to Southport, NC.

IMM Quality Boat Lifts offers a variety of boat lifts made from marine grade aluminum that are built to last. Backed by more than 35 years of experience in this industry, our patented engineering designs are the most reliable and easy-to-use boat lifts that you can find.

## Order Boat Lifts in Southport, NC

Manufactured locally in our Fort Myers, Florida factory, we are proud to be made in America. While our lifts are shipped around the world, it is always a comfort to know that we can meet the needs of our customers in the Southport area.

No matter what type of watercraft you own and what shoreline conditions exist at your home or business, IMM Quality Boat Lifts will build you a lift that perfectly suits your lifestyle. That is why our boat lifts are the preferred choice of discerning customers and have an unsurpassed reputation.

## Vertical Boat Lifts
[Skip to content](https://iqboatlifts.com/vertical-lifts/#content "Skip to content")

[Get a Quote](https://iqboatlifts.com/boat-lift-quotes/)

[Call Now 1-800-545-5603](tel:+18005455603)

# VERTICAL BOAT LIFTS

Built to last a lifetime, the IMM Quality vertical boat lifts are currently the most efficient design for a cable-drawn lift to date. Our **vertical boat lifts** were developed a couple of decades ago, and have quickly become the industry standard.

The IMM Quality vertical boat lift can be recognized by its parallel upper beams. Each contains a motor-driven shaft through their length, on which four cables are wound. The cables are connected to the four corners of the boat cradle, which is raised or lowered by a clockwise or counter-clockwise rotation of the shaft. Our top-beam vertical boat lifts can be set in a “low-profile” configuration, which allows you to use a covered top beam as a boarding platform for easy access to your boat.

## **World’s Best Vertical Boat Lifts for Sale**

Our vertical boat lifts have set the standard for top-quality manufacturing. IMM Quality Boat Lifts are superbly engineered by a highly trained, in-house team of the best and brightest minds in the industry. We use the latest 3D modeling and structural analysis software, making all parts in our fabrication factory. And, our machine work is completed on fully computerized machines, which guarantees consistently high quality.

Let the IMM Quality Boat Lifts engineering department make your dream come true, as we have done many times before, producing the most amazing boat lifts that have been sent through the United States, to the fjords in Norway or the shores of Dubai. [**Request a Vertical Boat Lift Quote.**](https://iqboatlifts.com/boat-lift-quotes/)

## **Types of Vertical Boat Lifts**

IMM Quality Boat Lifts currently offers three models of vertical boat lifts; the Alumavator, the Platinum, and the Superlift. The [**Alumavator Vertical Boat Lift**](https://iqboatlifts.com/vertical-lifts/alumavator/) is our battle-tested chain drive lift and is our most economical, though it comes with many features other companies consider optional upgrades. The [**Platinum Vertical Boat Lift**](https://iqboatlifts.com/vertical-lifts/platinum-lift/) is our maintenance-free, direct-drive boat lift with all the bells and whistles. And, the [**Superlift Vertical Boat Lift**](https://iqboatlifts.com/vertical-lifts/superlift/) is a rugged industrial-duty gearless boat lift. Originally designed for marine applications, the Superlift is the fastest, most efficient model on the market, and is the lift of choice for the most discerning boaters. To read further about the above-mentioned products, click on the labeled navigation tabs in the dropdown menus above.

[![bofsf qsl44 decked4 lum](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/08/BofSF-QSL44-Decked4-Lum-1.jpg)](https://iqboatlifts.com/vertical-lifts/superlift/)

### [Superlift Vertical Boat Lift](https://iqboatlifts.com/vertical-lifts/superlift/)

[![advanced marine construction 1 platinum lum](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/08/Advanced-Marine-Construction-1-Platinum-Lum-1.jpg)](https://iqboatlifts.com/vertical-lifts/platinum-lift/)

### [Platinum Vertical Boat Lift](https://iqboatlifts.com/vertical-lifts/platinum-lift/)

[![dc marine alumavator highspeed 1 lum](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/08/DC-Marine-Alumavator-HighSpeed-1-Lum-1.jpg)](https://iqboatlifts.com/vertical-lifts/alumavator/)

### [Alumavator Vertical Boat Lift](https://iqboatlifts.com/vertical-lifts/alumavator/)

## Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) about Vertical Boat Lifts

What makes IMM Quality vertical boat lifts stand out from other options on the market?

IMM Quality vertical boat lifts are renowned for their efficient design, durable construction, and precision engineering. Our lifts feature parallel upper beams and motor-driven shafts, providing seamless raising and lowering of the boat cradle. They are built to last and have set the standard for top-quality manufacturing in the industry.

What are the benefits of choosing a vertical boat lift over other types of boat lifts?

Vertical boat lifts offer several advantages, including efficient operation, space-saving design, and the ability to customize the lift for low-profile configurations. The vertical lifting mechanism ensures smooth and reliable performance, making them an ideal choice for various waterfront properties.

What types of vertical boat lifts does IMM Quality Boat Lifts offer?

IMM Quality Boat Lifts offers three models of vertical boat lifts: the Alumavator, the Platinum, and the Superlift. Each model caters to different needs and preferences, from economical yet feature-rich options to rugged industrial-duty lifts designed for the most discerning boaters.

How does IMM Quality ensure the durability and reliability of its vertical boat lifts?

Our vertical boat lifts are crafted with precision and engineered for excellence. We use the latest 3D modeling and structural analysis software to design our lifts and manufacture all components in our fabrication factory. Additionally, our lifts undergo rigorous testing to ensure they meet our high standards of quality and performance.

Can IMM Quality Boat Lifts accommodate specific customization requests for vertical boat lifts?

Yes, we understand that every waterfront property and boat owner has unique requirements. We offer customization options for our vertical boat lifts, including color choices, additional features, and low-profile configurations. Our team works closely with customers to ensure their lift meets their exact specifications.

What is the warranty coverage for IMM Quality vertical boat lifts?

We stand behind the quality and durability of our vertical boat lifts with comprehensive warranty coverage. Specific warranty terms may vary depending on the model and components of the lift. Our team can provide detailed information about warranty coverage upon request.

How can I request a quote or learn more about IMM Quality vertical boat lifts?

To request a quote or explore further details about our vertical boat lifts, simply reach out to us through our website's contact form or request a quote feature. Our knowledgeable team will be happy to assist you and provide personalized recommendations based on your needs and preferences.

Copyright © 2025 IMM Quality Boat Lifts

## Kayak Launch Lift
[Skip to content](https://iqboatlifts.com/kayak-launch/#content "Skip to content")

# KAYAK LAUNCH LIFTS

## **Launch or dock your kayak from the seawall with our NEW Kayak Launch Lift!**

You most likely love to be on the water, enjoying the scenery, discovering new things and breathing in the fresh air as you explore in your kayak. Getting in your kayak is a different story. Is your dock too high to safely launch your kayak? Does your dock even have a ladder down to the water? Have you come up with a method to launch your kayak that is very awkward and uncomfortable? Have you seen a kayak dock lift from other manufacturers that looks poorly made, shakes and wobbles, and quite frankly, looks unsafe to operate?

Do you find yourself using your kayak less than you would like because of these issues? Are you ready to kayak without these aggravations?

Kayak lifts for docks, developed by IMM Quality Boat Lifts, are a simple solution to get you back in the water in no time. With three generations of engineering experience, we designed our kayak dock lifts to be easy to use, take up a minimum of space, and still be built strong enough to last a lifetime.

IMM Quality Boat Lift’s innovative new kayak dock lift lets you easily get your kayak in and out of the water from your dock or seawall. This lift is offered with an ADA-compliant, built-in angled ladder for comfortable climbing. IMM Quality’s kayak launch lifts have a non-slip boarding platform to make getting in or out of your kayak safe and easy. The kayak launch lift also has an aluminum handrail for secure boarding and added safety. These kayak lifts for sale are available in three sizes (standard, large and dual) to suit your needs. The adjustable nylon bunks can accommodate any kayak size, as well as other small watercraft like canoes and paddleboards.

[Click Here to See a Figure of Standard Kayak Lift](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/05/Standard-Kayak-Lift-Figure.pdf)

[Click Here to See a Figure of Large Kayak Lift](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/05/Larger-Kayak-Lift-Figure.pdf)

[Click Here to See a Figure of Double Kayak Lift](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/05/Dual-Kayak-Picture-Dual-Lift.pdf)

## **Benefits**

- Easy to install
- Welded aluminum construction / stainless steel hardware
- Supports up to 1,000 pounds
- Up to 7-foot travel distance available
- Non-slip boarding platform
- Adjustable nylon bunks for kayaks of varying width
- Hand winch with auto-brake controls the up-and-down movement
- Grab rails provide stability during boarding
- No components below water in up position
- Out of water to protect the hull
- Protects against corrosion, marine growth and wake damage
- Convenient and stable access
- Makes boarding easier
- Provides access to clean the hull
- Perform maintenance on the boat with ease

## **Options**

- Mounts to seawalls or permanent docks
- Electric winch with solar power
- Built-in paddle hooks
- Regular platform (16″ by 48″, 600lbs capacity)
- Large platform (24″ by 48″ with 1,000-pound capacity)
- Dual launch platform (24″ by 84″ with 1,000-pound capacity)

## **Specifications**

Specifications for the Kayak Lift are shown in the following chart:

## Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) about  KAYAK LAUNCH LIFTS:

What is a kayak launch lift?

A kayak launch lift is a device designed to help kayakers easily and safely launch their kayaks from a dock or seawall into the water.

What are the benefits of using a kayak launch lift?

Kayak launch lifts offer easy installation, non-slip boarding platforms, adjustable nylon bunks for various kayak sizes, and grab rails for stability during boarding, providing convenient and stable access to the water.

How does a kayak launch lift work?

The lift uses a hand winch with an auto-brake to control the up-and-down movement, allowing kayakers to safely lower their kayak into the water and lift it back up after use.

Can a kayak launch lift accommodate different types of kayaks?

Yes, the lift's adjustable nylon bunks can accommodate kayaks of varying widths, as well as other small watercraft like canoes and paddleboards.

Are there different options available for kayak launch lifts?

Yes, there are options for mounting to seawalls or permanent docks, electric winches with solar power, built-in paddle hooks, and different platform sizes to suit various needs and preferences.

## Deck Boat Lifts
[Skip to content](https://iqboatlifts.com/deck-lifts/#content "Skip to content")

[Get a Quote](https://iqboatlifts.com/boat-lift-quotes/)

[Call Now 1-800-545-5603](tel:+18005455603)

# Deck Boat Lifts - Transform Your Docking Experience with State-of-the-Art Boat Lift Platforms

Deck boat lifts, also called platform boat lifts, add versatility and convenience to your boating experience. These floating boat lifts can be custom built to fit all IMM Quality Boat Lift styles and capacities. Each platform has an aluminum frame that is attached to the deck boat lift cradle. **Heat-resistant, anti-slip decking panels,** which are available in various colors,

are attached to the aluminum framing. These maintenance-free panels have an **environmentally friendly open grate design** that allows sunlight, wind, and water to flow through, keeping vegetation alive and allowing the floating deck boatlift to, **easily move into and out of the water**.

## **Tailor-Made Deck Lift Solutions for Ultimate Accessibility and Versatility**

Custom boat lift platform can be designed and built for larger vessels, such as offshore center consoles and even large yachts. The decked platforms, **add convenience for complete access** to your vessel, making boarding and boat maintenance very easy. The boat lift boarding platform **is also a great way to launch and service smaller vessels** such as kayaks, jet skis, and flats boats. When a deck lift is paired with a remote control system, it works exceptionally well with personal watercraft. For example, a kayaker can lower their kayak into the water using the remote, and when they return, they can kayak over top of the platform, and easily lift the kayak out of the water using the remote.

### **[Please visit the photo gallery](https://iqboatlifts.com/current-boat-lift-styles/), to see all the different ways deck boat lifts can improve your boating experience.**

![decked 5 shearwater lum](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/08/Decked-5-ShearWater-Lum.jpg)

![moore docks lowprofile 3](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/05/Moore-Docks-LowProfile-3.jpg)

![bofsf qsl44 decked4 lum](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20800%20600'%3E%3C/svg%3E)

## Deck Boat Lifts Gallery

## Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) about Deck Boat Lifts:

What are deck boat lifts?

Deck boat lifts, also known as platform boat lifts, are floating lifts that add versatility and convenience to boating, allowing for easy access and maintenance of vessels.

What materials are used in the construction of deck boat lifts?

Deck boat lifts are constructed with an aluminum frame and heat-resistant, anti-slip decking panels, which are available in various colors and allow for sunlight, wind, and water to flow through.

Can deck boat lifts be customized for different types of vessels?

Yes, deck boat lifts can be custom-built to fit all boat lift styles and capacities, accommodating larger vessels like offshore center consoles and large yachts.

What are the benefits of using a deck boat lift?

Deck boat lifts provide convenience for complete access to your vessel, making boarding and boat maintenance easy. They are also great for launching and servicing smaller vessels like kayaks, jet skis, and flats boats.

How can deck boat lifts be operated?

Deck boat lifts can be paired with a remote control system, allowing for easy operation, especially for personal watercraft like kayaks and jet skis.

Your local boat lift dealer will reach out to you within two business days to provide the information you requested.

## Boat Lifts Brunswick, GA
