# Boat Lifts in Brunswick, GA

Are you in search of reliable and durable boat lifts in Brunswick, Georgia? Look no further. We specialize in providing premium marine lifts designed to enhance your boating experience and protect your valuable investment. With years of experience and a commitment to excellence, we’re your trusted source for boat lifts in Brunswick.

## **Why Choose Our Boat Lifts in Brunswick**

Our boat lifts offer numerous benefits for boat owners in Brunswick:

**1\. Exceptional Quality:** We take pride in offering boat lifts that are built to last. Our products are constructed using high-quality materials to withstand the challenging marine conditions of Brunswick.

**2\. Customized Solutions:** We understand that every boat is unique. That’s why we offer custom boat lift solutions tailored to your specific vessel, ensuring a perfect fit.

**3\. Professional Installation:** Our team of experienced professionals is dedicated to installing your boat lift with precision and efficiency, providing you with peace of mind.

**4\. Unrivaled Durability:** Our boat lifts are engineered for long-term durability, ensuring your investment remains well-protected.

**5\. Local Expertise:** With our strong presence in Brunswick, we possess valuable knowledge of the local waterways and conditions, making us the go-to choice for boat lifts.

Ready to elevate your boating experience in Brunswick, GA? Don’t hesitate to reach out to us today. Our team is here to answer your inquiries, offer quotes, and assist you in finding the perfect boat lift solution for your needs. [Get a Quote](https://iqboatlifts.com/boat-lift-quotes/)

### **Looking for a Boat Lift in Brunswick, GA?**

![Boat Lifts in Brunswick, GA ](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/08/programming-img.jpg)

Brunswick is a city on the southeast coast of Georgia. Its known for its Victorian-era Old Town Historic District and the huge, centuries-old Lover’s Oak tree.

Causeways link the city to the 4 barrier islands of the Golden Isles. Sea Island has resorts and golf clubs. St. Simons Island is home to Fort Frederica National Monument, the preserved remains of an 18th-century stronghold, and St. Simons Lighthouse Museum.

Regardless of where you live in Brunswick, IMM Quality Boat Lifts understands your island city’s boatlift requirements and challenges.

## How To Order a Boat Lift in Brunswick, GA

IMM Quality Boat Lifts brings the world’s best boat lift designs to Brunswick, GA. We offer [a variety of boat lifts](https://iqboatlifts.com/boats-lifts/) made from marine-grade aluminum and built to last. Backed by more than 35 years of experience in this industry, our patented engineering designs are the most reliable and easy to use boat lifts that you can find.

Manufactured locally in our Fort Myers, Florida factory, we are proud to be made in America. While our lifts are shipped around the world, it is always a comfort to know that we can meet the needs of our customers in the Brunswick area.

No matter what type of watercraft you own and what shoreline conditions exist at your home or business, IMM Quality Boat Lifts will build you a lift that perfectly suits your lifestyle. That is why our boat lifts are the preferred choice of discerning customers and have an unsurpassed reputation.

# Elevate Your Maritime Adventure in Carrabelle, FL with Our Exclusive Boat Lifts!

Welcome to the gateway of coastal living, where the beauty of Carrabelle, FL meets the innovation of state-of-the-art Boat Lifts. Prepare to experience a new dimension of boating convenience, security, and luxury with our diverse selection of lifts, each meticulously designed to meet the unique needs of every water enthusiast.

## **Explore Our Range of Premier Boat Lifts**

### **Vertical Boat Lifts**

Elevate your boating experience with our [Vertical Boat Lifts](https://iqboatlifts.com/vertical-lifts/), designed for maximum space utilization and swift, hassle-free launches.

### **Elevator Boat Lifts**

Experience the future of lifting technology. [Elevator Boat Lifts](https://iqboatlifts.com/elevator-lifts/) provide efficient and stylish solutions for boat owners who value both convenience and aesthetics.

### **Deck Boat Lifts**

Tailored for [deck boats, our lifts](https://iqboatlifts.com/deck-lifts/) offer stability and ease, ensuring your vessel is always ready for your next maritime adventure.

### **Personal Watercraft Lifts**

Keep your personal watercraft safe and accessible with our specialized [PWC Jet Ski Lifts](https://iqboatlifts.com/pwc-jetski-lifts/). Designed for convenience, engineered for peace of mind.

### **Titan Yacht Lifts**

For yacht owners seeking unparalleled support, our [Titan Yacht Lifts](https://iqboatlifts.com/titan-yacht-lifts/) showcase the pinnacle of maritime engineering. Elevate your vessel with confidence.

### **Boat House Lifts**

Integrate functionality and style with our [Boat House Lifts](https://iqboatlifts.com/boat-house-lifts/), the perfect solution for waterfront properties with boathouses. Protect your boat with a touch of elegance!

Experience the ease of remote control systems, allowing you to lower or raise your vessel with the simple touch of a button. Spend more time enjoying the water, less time on logistics.

### **Boat Lifts in Carrabelle, FL**

![Google map of boat lifts in Carrabelle FL](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/02/carrabelle-fl-imm-quality-boat-lifts.png)

Carrabelle is located east of the center of Franklin County along the Carrabelle River. You’ll find it between St. George Sound to the south, and the Crooked and New Rivers to the north. To the south is Dog Island, separating St. George Sound from the Gulf of Mexico.

Regardless of where you live in Carrabelle, [IMM Quality Boat Lifts](https://iqboatlifts.com/about/) understands your island city’s boatlift requirements and challenges. We sell and deliver the world’s best boat lifts to Carrabelle, FL.

Backed by more than 35 years of experience in this industry, our patented engineering designs are the most reliable and easy-to-use boat lifts that you can find. Manufactured locally in our Fort Myers, Florida factory, we are proud to be made in America.

# Our   Commitment

## World's Leading Boat Lift Manufacturer: Our Commitment

Our commitment to you? IMM Quality Boat Lifts designs and manufactures the fastest, safest, easiest to use, best looking, most advanced and most reliable boat lifts and accessories.

We are dedicated to developing products that will meet or exceed our customer’s expectations while adhering to world class engineering standards.

Whether it’s a personal watercraft, run about, fishing boat, pontoon, high performance speed boat or a luxury yacht, IMM Quality has a boat lift perfectly sized, equipped and priced for your needs.

So, when only the absolute best boat lift will do, Remember IMM QUALITY BOAT LIFTS… **Built for a lifetime!**

### Our Commitment: Built for a Lifetime

The old adage “you get what you pay for” couldn’t be more true when it comes to IMM quality boat lifts. When our IMM Quality engineers design the first boat lift back in 1982, they engineer it to work smarter than all other lifts, and to exceed the toughest building codes. Heavier materials, all aluminum structural components, stainless steel cables and hardware, welded construction, etc. It is attention to detail that really sets our lifts apart.

We engineer our lifts with all the details in mind so you don’t have to worry about them! With continuous improvement based on our extensive experience on customer’s needs, we have perfected the art of building the best lifts in the industry! Why all the fuss? Well, we believe that weekends on the water should be spent relaxing with family and friends, not fixing broken equipment. Dependability was key way back then and it is a still today. Relax with an IMM Quality intelligent design, and spend your weekends doing what you love.

![red boat](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20336%20313'%3E%3C/svg%3E)

## Innovation Leaders in Boat Lift Technology

We have the largest full-time engineering staff of any boat lift company, no other company can match our technical expertise. The IMM Quality Boat Lifts team of experienced engineers is constantly examining our product lines. Based on input from customers, as well as changes to building code and the development of new technologies, IMM Quality’s engineers will design improvements to enhance your boat lift experience.

Our on-site product design testing facilities and rigorous scientific methods guarantee that these innovations don’t just look good on paper – they will exceed the performance expectations of our demanding engineers and satisfy our customers.

With dozens of patents and many more innovative design features, we are the cutting age of innovation – providing better features, easier maintenance, and greater longevity for our lifts.

![our commitment,IMM Quality Boat Lifts,boat lifts,world's best boat lifts,boat lifts for sale,easy-to-use boat lifts,Boat Lift Manufacturer](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20646%20366'%3E%3C/svg%3E)

## Build Your Dream

We are the most knowledgeable and experienced professionals you will ever encounter in the boat lift industry. The luxury of having a full service in-house engineering department means that IMM quality does not build one-size-fits-all products, we build lifts to accommodate your individual needs. That’s how building custom boat lifts and docks became our specialty.

We design and manufacture complete custom cradle systems to fit any boat. From catamarans to deep keel sailboats, to seaplanes, to large capacity yachts, to platform lifts with integrated decking, we are always available to help you in your design, location, and installation requirements for the perfect lift for your dream boat.

### **Get Started Today!**

The first step in creating your dream boat lift is to know the fully loaded weight of your watercraft. Not sure how to calculate this figure? Use our **[Boat Lift Capacity Calculator](https://iqboatlifts.com/boat-lift-capacity-calculator/)** or complete the **[form](https://iqboatlifts.com/our-commitment/#form)** below and a member of our team will contact you!

# Boat Lifts in Baltimore, MD

## World's Best Boat Lifts in Baltimore MD

**Why Choose IMM Boat Lifts in Baltimore:** Our boat lifts in Baltimore offer several advantages:

**1\. Superior Quality:** We pride ourselves on delivering boat hoists built to last. Our products are made with high-grade materials to withstand the harsh Baltimore marine environment.

**2\. Custom Solutions:** Every boat is unique, and so are our solutions. We offer customized boat lifts tailored to your specific requirements, ensuring a perfect fit for your vessel.

**3\. Expert Installation:** Our team of experienced professionals will install your boat lift efficiently and accurately, giving you peace of mind.

**4\. Unmatched Durability:** Our boat hoists are engineered for long-term durability, ensuring your investment is well-protected.

**5\. Local Expertise:** With a strong presence in Baltimore, we understand the local waterways and challenges, making us the trusted choice for boat lifts.

Baltimore is a major city in Maryland with a long history as an important seaport. Fort McHenry, the birthplace of the U.S. national anthem, “The Star-Spangled Banner,” sits at the mouth of Baltimore’s Inner Harbor. Today, this harbor area offers shops, upscale crab shacks, and attractions like the Civil War-era warship, the _USS Constellation_, and the National Aquarium, showcasing thousands of marine creatures.

Regardless of where you live in Baltimore, IMM Quality Boat Lifts understands your city’s boatlift requirements and challenges. This includes the following neighborhoods:

- Locust Point

# Boat lifts IN Plymouth -   IMM Quality Boat Lifts

### **Looking for Boat Lifts in Plymouth, MA?**

![Google map of boat lifts in Plymouth MA](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/02/plymouth-ma-imm-quality-boat-lifts.png)

Plymouth is a coastal town in Massachusetts, south of Boston. It is the site of the first Pilgrim settlement, founded in 1620. Plymouth Rock, a boulder in Pilgrim Memorial State Park, marks the place where settlers are thought to have landed on shore. The Mayflower II, a full-scale replica of the ship that carried the Pilgrims across the Atlantic, is usually anchored at the park.

Regardless of where you live in Plymouth, [IMM Quality Boat Lifts](https://iqboatlifts.com/about/) understands your island city’s boatlift requirements and challenges. IMM Quality Boat Lifts brings the world’s best boat lifts to Plymouth, MA.

IMM Quality Boat Lifts offers a [variety of boat lifts](https://iqboatlifts.com/boats-lifts/) made from marine-grade aluminum that are built to last. Backed by more than 35 years of experience in this industry, our patented engineering designs are the most reliable and easy to use boat lifts that you can find.

# Boat lifts IN Homosassa FL -   IMM Quality Boat Lifts

### **Looking for Boat Lifts in Homosassa, FL?**

![Map of boat lifts in Homosassa FL](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/02/homosassa-fl-imm-quality-boat-lifts.png)

On Florida’s Gulf Coast, near the southern end of what we call the Big Bend, Homosassa serves as home to several state parks including Homosassa Springs Wildlife State Park, where you can view manatees from an underwater observatory.

At the Yulee Sugar Mill State Park in Homosassa, you can visit a sugar mill used to supply troops during the Civil War. In the nearby Citrus County seat of Inverness, don’t miss the historic county courthouse, now more than 100 years old. It recently underwent a complete restoration and continues to look wonderful today.

Regardless of where you live in Homosassa, FL, [IMM Quality Boat Lifts](https://iqboatlifts.com/about/) understands your island city’s boatlift requirements and challenges. IMM Quality Boat Lifts brings the world’s best boat lifts to Homosassa, FL.

# IMM Quality Dealer Locator

“Help! I need to find a boat lift for sale near me!” If you are looking for the best boat lift dealer in the United States, then you have come to the right place. When the IMM Quality Boat Lifts team built our first boat lift back in 1982, we made a commitment to dependability, high standards and exceeding our customer’s expectations. Those values remain at the heart of our business today.

## Easy IMM Quality Dealer Locator

Thank you for your interest in IMM Quality Boat Lifts. Our product lines offer a variety of standard and customizable options to suit the budget and specific needs of virtually any homeowner. Our highly skilled engineering team has even designed and manufactured custom boat lifts for waterfront homes, in addition to floating docks and gangways, accessories and specialty upgrades.

To locate the nearest dealer in your area, please complete the form below. Your local boat lift dealer with contact you within two business days to provide the information you requested.

# Boat lifts IN Wilmington -   IMM Quality Boat Lifts

### **Looking for Boat Lifts in Wilmington, NC?**

![Google map of boat lifts in Wilmington NC](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/02/wilmington-nc-imm-quality-boat-lifts.png)

Wilmington is a port city in North Carolina. It’s known as a gateway to Cape Fear Coast beaches like Wrightsville, with its strong surf, and Carolina, with its long boardwalk. Part of downtown’s Historic District, the Riverwalk is lined with restaurants, galleries and shops. It runs along the Cape Fear River, where the Battleship North Carolina is moored. Artifacts on the ship explore WWII naval combat history.

Regardless of where you live in Wilmington, [IMM Quality Boat Lifts](https://iqboatlifts.com/about/) understands your island city’s boatlift requirements and challenges. IMM Quality Boat Lifts brings [the world’s best boat lifts](https://iqboatlifts.com/boats-lifts/) to Wilmington, NC.

IMM Quality Boat Lifts offers a variety of boat lifts made from marine-grade aluminum that are built to last. Backed by more than 35 years of experience in this industry, our patented engineering designs are the most reliable and easy to use boat lifts that you can find.

## Beamless Boat Lifts
[Skip to content](https://iqboatlifts.com/beamless-lifts/#content "Skip to content")

[Get a Quote](https://iqboatlifts.com/boat-lift-quotes/)

[Call Now 1-800-545-5603](tel:+18005455603)

# Beamless Lifts

Beamless boat lifts are preferred by many homeowners, because there are no beams to avoid when boarding the boat or to obstruct the view of the waterway. IMM Quality’s beamless boatlift system has four individual powerheads to allow independent adjustment at all corners. Our beamless boat lift utilizes the Platinum drive, an aluminum double worm transmission for a maintenance-free direct drive-to-shaft connection. Furthermore, the beamless boat lifts are available with a double-speed drive, making IMM Quality’s superiority all the more pronounced.

Unlike our competitors, we do not use load-bearing, underwater cable tie-offs. This design flaw makes the competitor’s beamless boatlifts difficult to install, inspect and service. It also decreases the durability and safety of the beamless lift by unnecessarily keeping these load bearing parts under water, where they are subject to corrosion and electrolysis. IMM Quality Boat Lifts takes pride in our engineering and product design expertise, along with our unique capability to thoroughly performance-test our beamless boat lifts before they leave our factory. Take a look at our design, and see why IMM Quality Boat Lifts are built to last a lifetime.

[Click Here to See a Figure of Beamless Lift Features](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/02/Beamless.pdf)

## **Beamless Lift Standard Features**

- All type 6061-T6 aluminum and type 300 stainless steel construction
- Our custom aluminum bunks, covered in white vinyl, are guaranteed not to float. They are covered by a 10-year warranty against tearing, fading, mold and corrosion.
- Heavy-duty, rotomolded cover encloses powerheads to extend product life by protecting the mechanical and electrical components from windblown rain and salt spray
- Only IMM Quality uses grooved aluminum cable rollers to keep the cable tight on the winder and in the grooves, which dramatically increases cable life
- Maintenance-free aluminum pulleys with unique self-lubricating bearing
- Maintenance-free aluminum bearing blocks with no-lube Igus bushings
- Stainless steel aircraft grade cables
- Stainless steel hardware
- Heavy-duty reinforced guide post base with PVC-covered guide post that are easily adjustable
- Gem 4-motor remote control with handheld transmitter that enables in-water operation of your beamless boatlift system
- Maintenance-free double worm direct drive

## **Options**

- High-speed version is twice as fast
- Walk boards
- Steps
- Stern platforms
- Tide guides
- Remote upgrades to allow auto-stops and lighting control
- Solar power

### **Beamless Lift Specifications**

Beamless Boat Lifts are available in six sizes up to 24,000 pounds.

[Beamless Lift Specification Sheet PDF Download](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/02/Beamless-3-13-15.pdf)

# Boat lifts IN Destin -   IMM Quality Boat Lifts

### **Looking for Boat Lifts in Destin, FL?**

![Google map of boat lifts in Destin FL](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/02/destin-fl-imm-quality-boat-lifts.png)

Destin is a city in northwest Florida, in the area known as the Panhandle. It’s known for its Gulf of Mexico beaches and many golf courses, as well as the Destin Harbor Boardwalk. Nature trails pass through the dunes of Henderson Beach State Park in the south, where the coastline is dotted with pine and oak trees sheltering wildlife. To the west are the tall slides, waterfalls and pools of Big Kahuna’s water park.

Regardless of where you live in Destin, IMM Quality Boat Lifts understands your island city’s boatlift requirements and challenges. IMM Quality Boat Lifts brings [the world’s best boat lifts](https://iqboatlifts.com/about/) to Destin, FL.

IMM Quality Boat Lifts offers a variety of boat lifts made from marine grade aluminum that are built to last. Backed by more than 35 years of experience in this industry, our patented engineering designs are the most reliable and easy-to-use boat lifts that you can find. Manufactured locally in our Fort Myers, Florida factory, we are proud to be made in America.

## History of Boat Lifts
[Skip to content](https://iqboatlifts.com/about/history/#content "Skip to content")

[Get a Quote](https://iqboatlifts.com/boat-lift-quotes/)

[Call Now 1-800-545-5603](tel:+18005455603)

# Boat Lifting - The History Of Boat Lifts

## From Ancient Pulley Systems to Modern Hydraulic Lifts: A Historical Overview of Boat Lifting Technology

Before the mid-1970s, boats were typically lifted with a pair of davits. These crane-like structures are mounted to a piling or set in the ground above a sea wall. They utilize a fore and an aft cable, which are connected to lifting eyes on the watercraft.

Boaters find davits difficult to use, as the distance between connecting points on the boat make them challenging for one person to operate. Davits are used today for lifting smaller watercraft in some unique situations. However, their position as the industry standard has been largely replaced by lifts that support the boat on bunk boards connected to a lifting platform or cradle system.

A major breakthrough in boat lift design occurred in the 1980s. Aluminum was introduced as a structural material to replace galvanized steel. Although slightly more expensive than steel, its long-term appearance and corrosion resistance make it a superior alternative.

Today, the best boat lifts are made from aluminum. It has steadily supplanted galvanized steel, as consumers have become knowledgeable enough to recognize its superiority.

### **The Modern History of Boat Lifts**

Over the last 40 years, a number of methods to lift a boat with a cradle system have been developed for marine lift applications. Hydraulic cylinders, pneumatic flotation and wound cables have been explored in various configurations. Hydraulic boat lifts have been found to be difficult to protect from saltwater corrosion, susceptible to oil leakage and relatively expensive.

Piling or sea wall mounted cable-drawn boat lifts have become the choice in coastal waters. They lift the boat free of the water in minimal space at an affordable price. Of course, a number of ingenious cable routing and structural techniques have been developed by IMM Quality engineers.

[Our boat lifts are intelligently designed and rigorously tested](https://iqboatlifts.com/how-imm-quality-builds-the-worlds-best-boat-lifts-2/) at our in-house facility, field tested by more than 25,000 lifts during over 40 years in business, and continuously refined by our engineers based on feedback from our customers. IMM Quality Boat Lifts now offers the following models: [vertical boat lifts](https://iqboatlifts.com/vertical-lifts/), [elevator boat lifts](https://iqboatlifts.com/elevator-lifts/), [boat house lifts](https://iqboatlifts.com/boat-house-lifts/), [personal watercraft lifts](https://iqboatlifts.com/pwc-jetski-lifts/), [yacht lifts](https://iqboatlifts.com/titan-yacht-lifts/#foogallery-11806/i:15255) and [specialty boat lifts](https://iqboatlifts.com/specialty-lifts/). To explore these styles and learn more about IMM Quality Boat Lifts, visit our [boat lifts product information page](https://iqboatlifts.com/boats-lifts/).

![boat lifts,history,IMM Quality Boat Lifts](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/04/history01.jpg)Davits

![Intrepid 410 Evolution bunked on an IMM Quality Superlift in the upright position](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/02/Intrepid-bunked-on-Superlift-with-lift-in-the-up-position.jpg)Dual Superlifts in a Boat Garage

![qsl10k superlift 1](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/05/QSL10K-Superlift-1.jpg)Vertical Superlift

![IMM Quality Superlift boat lift with red and black nor tech 450 sport at a dock with shallow water](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/04/IMM-Quality-Superlift-Boat-Lift-with-Red-and-Black-Nor-Tech-450-Sport-at-a-dock-with-low-water-depth-4-scaled-e1649878415893.jpg)Custom Superlift with Custom-Designed Cradles

IMM Quality Boat Lifts has consistently embraced innovation to provide the best designs, top quality and highest reliability.

## Ascension Stair Lift
[Skip to content](https://iqboatlifts.com/the-ascension/#content "Skip to content")

[Get a Quote](https://iqboatlifts.com/boat-lift-quotes/)

[Call Now 1-800-545-5603](tel:+18005455603)

# The Ascension Stair Lift

IMM Quality Boat Lift’s revolutionary new **Ascension Stair Lift** is the latest example of our innovation and engineering excellence. The Ascension Stair Lift features self-leveling steps, so you can stand on a completely flat tread no matter how high you raise the platform after the stair boatlift installation.

The Ascension Stair Boat Lift offers convenient water access for a variety of purposes because the stairs are capable of going both up and down. Maybe you want an **adjustable height boarding platform** for your boat? Maybe you want an easy way to get your PWC, kayak, or paddle board down to the water? How about an easy access swim platform?

Would you like to have stairs with a platform below the waterline so that your pets can get out of the water without help? No matter how you choose to enjoy the water, the Ascension Stair Boatlifts for sale provides **safe and reliable water access** that is easy to use.

![Man uses ascension stair boat lift to exit his boat](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/02/12.jpg)

[Click Here to See a Figure of Standard Ascension Stair Lift](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/02/AscensionDOWN2-scaled.jpg)

## **Standard Features**

- Rated for 1,500 pounds
- All aluminum and stainless steel construction
- Maintenance-free aluminum pulleys with unique self-lubricating bearing
- Stainless steel aircraft-grade cable or nylon strap
- The articulating stairway includes an ADA compliant heavy-duty handrail
- Aluminum extruded 2’ wide steps (11.5” deep) with non-slip safety treads
- Heavy-duty winch with remote control
- 7 steps provide 4’ range of travel

## **Options**:

- Custom cradles and bunks to accommodate a variety of watercraft
- Custom width stairs
- Custom number of steps for a greater range of travel
- Maintenance-free solar power system

![Man in a kayak at the bottom of the ascension stair lift](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20804%20553'%3E%3C/svg%3E)

![ascension boat lift by iq boat lifts](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20624%20436'%3E%3C/svg%3E)

## Get Ascension Stair Lift Quote

Our product lines offer a variety of standard and customizable options to suit the budget and specific needs of virtually any boat owner. To request an estimate, please fill out the form below to be connected with a [local boat lift dealer near you](https://iqboatlifts.com/dealer-locator/). Your local boat lift dealer will reach out to you within two business days to provide the information you requested.

## Elevator Boat Lifts
[Skip to content](https://iqboatlifts.com/elevator-lifts/#content "Skip to content")

[Get a Quote](https://iqboatlifts.com/boat-lift-quotes/)

[Call Now 1-800-545-5603](tel:+18005455603)

# Elevator Boat Lifts

**Elevator Boat** **Lifts** are used on restricted waterfronts where outboard pilings are not allowed, such as on narrow canals. Elevator boat lifts are also used where the driving of pilings is difficult due to hard-bottom conditions.

[**Get a boat lift quote online**](https://iqboatlifts.com/boat-lift-quotes/)

IMM Quality elevator boat lifts can be mounted on seawalls or pilings, and in a vertical or inclined position. Our elevator boat lifts are gusseted using one-inch thick billet aluminum plates that have CNC-machined channels that accept the upper and lower flanges of the elevator boat lift’s carriage I-beam (see video below).

No other manufacturer has this feature on elevator boat lifts for sale. Not only does this provide mechanical support for the I-beam, but it also guarantees the correct geometry in all three dimensions. It also fixes the proper angles for the arms. With IMM Quality’s superior manufacturing capabilities, there is no need to worry about over stressed welds or your elevator arms being out of alignment.

## **Types of Elevator Boat Lifts**

IMM Quality Boat Lifts currently offers three types of elevator boat lifts. These are the Alumavator boat lift, including its select model; the Platinum elevator lift and the Superlift elevator boat lift.

The **Alumavator / Select** is IMM Quality’s battle-tested chain drive lift. Elevator boat lift prices for this Alumavator Select model are our most economical, even though it comes with many features other companies consider optional upgrades.

The **Platinum** elevator lift is our maintenance-free, direct drive lift with all the bells and whistles.

The **Superlift** is a rugged, industrial-duty gearless elevator boat lift system. Originally designed for marina applications, it is the fastest, most efficient lift on the market and is the lift of choice for the most discerning boaters.

To read further about the types of elevator boat lifts by IMM Quality, click on the labeled navigation tabs in the dropdown menus above, or on the images below.

[![IMM Quality Superlift elevator boat lift with white and yellow boat above the water in Chaparral](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20800%20600'%3E%3C/svg%3E)](https://iqboatlifts.com/elevator-lifts/superlift-elevator-lift/)

### [Superlift Elevator Boat Lifts](https://iqboatlifts.com/elevator-lifts/superlift-elevator-lift/)

[![Elevator Boat Lifts superlift elevator waits for boat to dock](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20800%20600'%3E%3C/svg%3E)](https://iqboatlifts.com/elevator-lifts/platinum-elevator-lift/)

### [Platinum Elevator Boat Lifts](https://iqboatlifts.com/elevator-lifts/platinum-elevator-lift/)

[![kitzen alumavator highspeed elevator boat lift](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20800%20600'%3E%3C/svg%3E)](https://iqboatlifts.com/elevator-lifts/alumavator-elevator-lift/)

### [Alumavator Elevator Boat Lifts](https://iqboatlifts.com/elevator-lifts/alumavator-elevator-lift/)

## Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) about Elevator Boat Lifts

What makes IMM Quality elevator boat lifts suitable for restricted waterfronts?

They are designed for areas where outboard pilings are prohibited or challenging due to conditions like narrow canals or hard-bottom sites.

How are IMM Quality elevator boat lifts mounted?

They can be installed on seawalls or pilings and positioned vertically or inclined, offering flexibility for various waterfront conditions.

What unique manufacturing feature do IMM Quality elevator boat lifts offer?

Their lifts incorporate gusseted, CNC-machined billet aluminum plates for enhanced support and precise alignment of the carriage I-beam.

What types of elevator boat lifts does IMM Quality offer?

They provide the Alumavator and its Select model, the Platinum lift, and the Superlift, each catering to different needs and preferences.

How does IMM Quality ensure the durability and alignment of their elevator boat lifts?

Through superior manufacturing techniques that prevent overstressed welds and ensure the correct alignment of elevator arms.

## Boat Lifts Annapolis
[Skip to content](https://iqboatlifts.com/maryland/annapolis/#content "Skip to content")

[Get a Quote](https://iqboatlifts.com/boat-lift-quotes/)

[Call Now 1-800-545-5603](tel:+18005455603)

# Boat lifts Annapolis   IMM Quality Boat Lifts

### **Looking for a Boat Lift in Annapolis, MD?**

![Google map of boat lifts in Annapolis MD](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/02/annapolis-md-imm-quality-boat-lifts.png)

Annapolis, Maryland’s capital city, is located on Chesapeake Bay – a boater’s paradise. Its historic district includes 18th-century brick houses and the domed 1700s Maryland State House. On Church Circle, the Romanesque-style St. Anne’s Episcopal Church has Tiffany glass windows and a historic cemetery. The sprawling waterfront grounds of the United States Naval Academy feature beaux arts architecture, monuments and a naval history museum. But regardless of where you live in Annapolis, [IMM Quality Boat Lifts](https://iqboatlifts.com/about/) understands your island city’s boatlift requirements and challenges.

IMM Quality Boat Lifts brings the [world’s best boat lifts](https://iqboatlifts.com/boats-lifts/) to Annapolis, MD. IMM Quality Boat Lifts offers a variety of boat lifts made from marine-grade aluminum that are built to last. Backed by more than 35 years of experience in this industry, our patented engineering designs are the most reliable and easy to use of any boat lifts that you can find. Manufactured in our Fort Myers, Florida factory, we are proud to be made in America.

While our lifts are shipped around the world, it is always a comfort to know that we can meet the needs of our customers in the Annapolis, Maryland area. No matter what type of watercraft you own and what shoreline conditions exist at your home or business, IMM Quality Boat Lifts will build you a lift that perfectly suits your lifestyle. That is why our boat lifts are the preferred choice of discerning customers and have an unsurpassed reputation in the following Annapolis neighborhoods:

- City Center at St. John’s College
- Saint Margaret’s at Beechwood on the Burley
- Epping Forest
- Sherwood Forest
- Eastport
- President St. & Boucher Ave.
- Highland Beach
- Browns Woods at Manresa
- Gingerville at Cape St. John
- Hillsmere Shores

Boat Lifts in Annapolis, MD

# Top Quality Boat Lifts in Fort Walton Beach, FL By IMM Quality Boat Lifts

## **Looking for Boat Lifts in Fort Walton Beach, FL?**

![Google map of boat lifts in Fort Walton Beach](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/02/fort-walton-fl-imm-quality-boat-lifts.png)

Fort Walton Beach is a small city in the Florida Panhandle. It’s known for its fine white-sand beaches on adjacent Okaloosa Island. The island’s Gulfarium Marine Adventure Park is home to dolphins, penguins, and alligators. The Indian Temple Mound Museum includes the prehistoric Temple Mound and Native American artifacts. And the Northeast, the Air Force Armament Museum displays artifacts and aircraft from WWI to the present.

Regardless of where you live in Fort Walton Beach, [IMM Quality Boat Lifts](https://iqboatlifts.com/) understands your island city’s boatlift requirements and challenges. IMM Quality Boat Lifts brings [the world’s best boat lifts](https://iqboatlifts.com/) to Fort Walton Beach, FL.

IMM Quality Boat Lifts offers a variety of boat lifts made from marine-grade aluminum that are built to last. Backed by more than 35 years of experience in this industry, our patented engineering designs are the most reliable and easy-to-use boat lifts that you can find. Manufactured locally in our Fort Myers, Florida factory, we are proud to be made in America.

## **Order Boat Lifts in Fort Walton Beach, FL**

While our lifts are shipped around the world, it is always a comfort to know that we can meet the needs of our customers in the Fort Walton area. No matter what type of watercraft you own and what shoreline conditions exist at your home or business, IMM Quality Boat Lifts will build you a lift that perfectly suits your lifestyle. That is why our boat lifts are the preferred choice of discerning customers and have an unsurpassed reputation.

## PWC Jet Ski Lifts
[Skip to content](https://iqboatlifts.com/pwc-jetski-lifts/#content "Skip to content")

[Get a Quote](https://iqboatlifts.com/boat-lift-quotes/)

[Call Now 1-800-545-5603](tel:+18005455603)

# PWC Jet Ski Lifts for Easy Watercraft Access

IMM Quality Boat Lifts manufactures **the world’s best PWC jet ski lifts**. Available with mounts for seawall, dock, and piling installations. Our personal watercraft lifts are designed to make it easy for you to get your jet ski in and out of the water, so you can spend more time on the water and less time struggling with your equipment.

We offer a range of PWC lifts to suit different needs and preferences. If you need a lift that can be used in different water depths, our floating jet ski lifts are the perfect solution. If you prefer a fixed or stationary lift, our stationary jet ski lifts are a great choice.

We understand that durability is important when it comes to your equipment, which is why we offer aluminum jet ski lifts. These lifts are lightweight yet strong, ensuring that your jet ski is safe and secure when lifted out of the water.

## Find the Best PWC Jetski Lifts for Sale:

The [**PWC 1,500**](https://iqboatlifts.com/1500-pwc-jetski-lift/ "PWC 1500 Personal Watercraft Lift") swivel lift rotates 180 degrees over your dock or seawall for storage, and is an ideal product for a single jet ski.

Our [**PWC** **3,000**](https://iqboatlifts.com/3000-2/ "PWC 3000 Personal Watercraft Lift") lift can handle everything from jet skis and small jet boats to small skiffs.

The [**4,500 Dual** **PWC**](https://iqboatlifts.com/4500-dual-pwc/ "4500 Dual PWC Jet Ski Lift") jetski lift is a traditional elevator lift fitted with dual bunking and guide system to mount a pair of jet skis. This PWC jetski lift for sale includes an 8-foot walk plank for easy access to either craft.

The [**4,500 Dual** **PWC**](https://iqboatlifts.com/4500-dual-pwc/ "4500 Dual PWC Jet Ski Lift") and [**PWC** **3,000**](https://iqboatlifts.com/3000-2/ "PWC 3000 Personal Watercraft Lift") jetski lifts are available in both vertical and incline models. These PWC jetski lifts also offer full I-beam tracks or split I-beam tracks, which is recommended in areas where higher levels of electrolysis are present. To read further about IMM Quality Boat Lifts three _**PWC jetski lifts**_, click on the labeled navigation tabs in the dropdown menus above or on the images below.

[![pwc 1500 with jetski lum](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20799%20600'%3E%3C/svg%3E)](https://iqboatlifts.com/1500-pwc-jetski-lift/#foogallery-13773/i:15112)

### [1,500 PWC Jetski Lift](https://iqboatlifts.com/1500-pwc-jetski-lift/\#foogallery-13773/i:15112)

[![PWC 3000 boat lift in bright white](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20801%20600'%3E%3C/svg%3E)](https://iqboatlifts.com/pwc-jetski-lifts/3000-2/#foogallery-13775/i:13580)

### [3,000 PWC Jetski Lift](https://iqboatlifts.com/pwc-jetski-lifts/3000-2/\#foogallery-13775/i:13580)

[![elevator pwc4500 lum](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20800%20600'%3E%3C/svg%3E)](https://iqboatlifts.com/4500-dual-pwc/)

### [4,500 Dual PWC Jetski Lift](https://iqboatlifts.com/4500-dual-pwc/)

## Personal Watercraft Lifts (PWC) Gallery

## Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) about PWC Jet Ski Lift:

What is a PWC jet ski lift?

A PWC jet ski lift is a device designed to lift and store personal watercraft (PWC) like jet skis out of the water, making it easier to access and maintain the watercraft.

What types of mounts are available for PWC jet ski lifts?

PWC jet ski lifts are available with mounts for seawall, dock, and piling installations to suit different waterfront setups.

What are the benefits of using a PWC jet ski lift?

PWC jet ski lifts provide easy access to your jet ski, reduce wear and tear, prevent algae growth and hull damage, and save time and effort compared to traditional launching methods.

Can PWC jet ski lifts be used in different water depths?

Yes, there are floating jet ski lifts available that can be used in varying water depths, making them versatile for different locations.

Are PWC jet ski lifts durable?

PWC jet ski lifts are typically made of aluminum, which is lightweight yet strong, ensuring durability and security for your jet ski when lifted out of the water.

## Get PWC Jetski Lifts Quote

Our product lines offer a variety of standard and customizable options to suit the budget and specific needs of virtually any boat owner. Your local boat lift dealer will reach out to you within two business days to provide the information you requested.

# Boat lifts IN Naples -   IMM Quality Boat Lifts

### **Looking for Boat Lifts in Cocoa Beach, FL?**

![Google map with boat lifts in Cocoa Beach, FL](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/02/cocoa-beach-fl-imm-quality-boat-lifts.png)

Cocoa Beach is a Florida city south of Cape Canaveral Air Force Station. It’s a gateway to the Kennedy Space Center Visitor Complex, which has rockets and iconic artifacts.

The city is also known for its beach and surf breaks. Inside a surf shop, the Florida Surf Museum traces the sport’s local history. Nearby Cocoa Beach Pier has eateries and shops. The maritime forest at oceanfront Lori Wilson Park attracts birdlife.

Regardless of where you live in Cocoa Beach, [IMM Quality Boat Lifts](https://iqboatlifts.com/about/) understands your island city’s boatlift requirements and challenges. IMM Quality Boat Lifts brings the world’s best boat lifts to Cocoa Beach, FL.

IMM Quality Boat Lifts offers [a variety of boat lifts](https://iqboatlifts.com/boats-lifts/) made from marine grade aluminum that are built to last. Backed by more than 35 years of experience in this industry, our patented engineering designs are the most reliable and easy to use boat lifts that you can find. Manufactured locally in our Fort Myers, Florida factory, we are proud to be made in America.

# BOAT LIFTS IN STUART -   IMM QUALITY BOAT LIFTS

### ![Google map of boat lifts in Stuart FL](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/04/Stuart-Florida-Boat-Lifts.png)**Looking for boat lifts in Stuart, FL?**

Known as the sailfish capital of the world, Stuart was founded in 1914 as a quiet seaside city. Historically, the area was known for harboring pirates and the remains of several notable shipwrecks that collectively carried vast quantities of silver and gold.

Today, the city is home to a small community of about 16,000 residents that enjoy several seaside activities like going to Stuart Beach or Sailfish Splash Waterpark. Stuart, known as one of the best small towns to visit in the United States, boasts several safe waterfront neighborhoods like Snug Harbor and Seminole Shores.

No matter where you live in Stuart’s beautiful little coast, [IMM Quality Boat Lifts](https://iqboatlifts.com/about/) understands the coastal city’s boat lift needs.

## Purchase Boat Lifts in Stuart, FL

IMM Quality Boat Lifts brings [the world’s best boat lifts](https://iqboatlifts.com/boats-lifts/) to Stuart, FL. IMM Quality Boat Lifts offers a variety of boat lifts made from marine-grade aluminum that are built to last. Backed by more than 35 years of experience in this industry, our patented engineering designs are the most reliable and easy to use boat lifts that you can find. Manufactured locally in our Fort Myers, Florida factory, we are proud to be **made in America**.

While our lifts are shipped around the world, it is always a comfort to know that we can meet the needs of our customers in the Stuart area. No matter what type of watercraft you own and what shoreline conditions exist at your home, IMM Quality Boat Lifts will build you a lift that perfectly suits your needs. That is why our boat lifts are the preferred choice of discerning customers and have an unsurpassed reputation that speaks for itself.

[![Small image of red and white boat on Titan Yacht lift](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/04/Titan-Yacht-Lifts.jpg)](https://iqboatlifts.com/titan-yacht-lifts/)

### [Titan Yacht Lifts](https://iqboatlifts.com/titan-yacht-lifts/)

Our TITAN line of luxury yacht boat lifts sets a new standard for performance, safety, and reliability to lift even the largest of yachts.

[Read more](https://iqboatlifts.com/titan-yacht-lifts/)

[![Small image of large covered boathouse lift](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/04/Boathouse-10.jpg)](https://iqboatlifts.com/boat-house-lifts/)

### [Boat House Lifts](https://iqboatlifts.com/boat-house-lifts/)

Our boathouse lifts can be built to be a structural part of your boathouse using custom stringer brackets welded to the top of a beamed boat lift.

[Read more](https://iqboatlifts.com/boat-house-lifts/)

[![Small blurry photo of floating docks available for sale](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/04/floatingdocks01.jpg)](https://iqboatlifts.com/floating-docks-and-gangways/)

### [Floating Docks and Gangways](https://iqboatlifts.com/floating-docks-and-gangways/)

Our gangways, docks, and piers all start with the same rugged frames made from marine grade aluminum that is incredibly strong and stable.

[Read more](https://iqboatlifts.com/floating-docks-and-gangways/)

[![TENV-and-TEFC-motors](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/04/TENV-and-TEFC-motors.jpg)](https://iqboatlifts.com/accessories/)

### [Accessories](https://iqboatlifts.com/accessories/)

IMM Quality Boat Lift’s high performance boat lift accessories are made from the finest materials and are durable and easy to use.

[Read more](https://iqboatlifts.com/accessories/)

## Boat Lifts Elizabeth City

# Boat lifts IN Elizabeth City -   IMM Quality Boat Lifts

### **Looking for Boat Lifts in Elizabeth City, NC?**

![Google map boat lifts in Elizabeth City](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/02/elizabeth-city-nc-imm-quality-boat-lifts.png)

Elizabeth City is a wonderful community that has been named one of the “100 Best Small Towns in America” and is ranked by Money Magazine as “one of best places to live on the East Coast.”

Situated in the northeastern corner of North Carolina on the Pasquotank River and Intracoastal Waterway, the City lies just west of the Outer Banks of North Carolina and just south of Hampton Roads, Virginia. It is rich in history yet progressive and growing. The City is very proud to have been declared a “Coast Guard City” on May 29, 2015 by Admiral Paul Zukunft, 25th Commandant of the United States Coast Guard.

Regardless of where you live in Elizabeth City, [IMM Quality Boat Lifts](https://iqboatlifts.com/about/) understands your city’s boatlift requirements and challenges. IMM Quality Boat Lifts brings [the world’s best boat lifts](https://iqboatlifts.com/boats-lifts/) to Elizabeth City, NC.

IMM Quality Boat Lifts offers a variety of boat lifts made from marine-grade aluminum that are built to last. Backed by more than 35 years of experience in this industry, our patented engineering designs are the most reliable and easy to use boat lifts that you can find. Manufactured locally in our Fort Myers, Florida factory, we are proud to be made in America.

## Order Boat Lifts in Elizabeth City, NC

While our lifts are shipped around the world, it is always a comfort to know that we can meet the needs of our customers in the Elizabeth City area. No matter what type of watercraft you own and what shoreline conditions exist at your home or business, IMM Quality Boat Lifts will build you a lift that perfectly suits your lifestyle. That is why our boat lifts are the preferred choice of discerning customers and have an unsurpassed reputation.

#### Elizabeth City Boat Lifts Products & Accessories

# BOAT LIFTS IN CHICAGO -   IMM QUALITY BOAT LIFTS

## **Looking for boat lifts in Chicago, IL?**

![Boat Lifts in Houston TX 1](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/10/boat-lifts-chicago-il.png)

Incorporated in 1837, Chicago, Illinois is one of the most important business centers in the world and it is known for its bold architecture and skyline punctuated with skyscrapers like the Hancock Building, Willis Tower and the Tribune Tower. Windy City landmarks include Millennium Park, Navy Pier, Magnificent Mile and the Lincoln Park Zoo. Chi-Town also boasts numerous cultural and entertainment icons like the Field Museum, Art Institute of Chicago, Museum of Science and Industry, Shedd Aquarium, Wrigley Field and Soldier Field. From the North Side to the South Side, IMM Quality Boat Lifts knows Chicago.

### Order Boat Lifts in Chicago IL

IMM Quality Boat Lifts provides [the best boat lifts](https://iqboatlifts.com/boats-lifts/) in Chicago, IL. We also provide the best boat lifts to the Midwest, made of marine-grade aluminum and built to stand the test of time. For over 40 years, [IMM Quality Boat Lifts](https://iqboatlifts.com/about/) has manufactured the most reliable boat lifts at our factory in Fort Myers, FL. We are proud to be made in America. And for 35 years, our South Florida factory has shipped lifts all over the USA, making us the preferred boat lift vendor for the Chicagoland area.

![Google map of boat lifts in Flagler Beach FL](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/02/flagler-beach-fl-imm-quality-boat-lifts.png)

The Flagler Beaches and Palm Coast has a way of bringing out all the best parts of anyone who visits. The natural beauty and environmental wonders will speak to your internal compass as you make connections with adventures grounded in nature. In our most natural state, we crave the meaningful experiences with those who matter most to us – and this is a place where that happens authentically.

Regardless of where you live in Flagler, IMM Quality Boat Lifts understands your island city’s boatlift requirements and challenges. IMM Quality Boat Lifts brings the world’s best boat lifts to Flagler Beach, FL. IMM Quality Boat Lifts offers a variety of boat lifts made from marine-grade aluminum that are built to last.

Backed by more than 35 years of experience in this industry, our patented engineering designs are the most reliable and easy-to-use boat lifts that you can find. Manufactured locally in our Fort Myers, Florida factory, we are proud to be made in America.

## Boat Lifts Vero Beach
[Skip to content](https://iqboatlifts.com/vero-beach-fl/#content "Skip to content")

# Boat lifts IN Vero Beach -   IMM Quality Boat Lifts

### **Looking for Boat Lifts in Vero Beach, FL?**

![Google map of boat lifts in Vero Beach FL](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/02/vero-beach-fl-imm-quality-boat-lifts.png)

Vero Beach is a small Florida city, with Atlantic-facing beaches on a barrier island across the Indian River Lagoon. South Beach Park offers wide sands and volleyball courts. Downtown’s South Beach Park chronicles the local citrus industry. On the outskirts, McKee Botanical Garden has tropical plants and water lily–filled streams. To the north, Pelican Island National Wildlife Refuge shelters brown pelicans.

Regardless of where you live in Vero Beach, [IMM Quality Boat Lifts](https://iqboatlifts.com/about/) understands your island city’s boatlift requirements and challenges. IMM Quality Boat Lifts brings the world’s best boat lifts to Vero Beach, FL.

IMM Quality Boat Lifts offers a [variety of boat lifts](https://iqboatlifts.com/boats-lifts/) made from marine-grade aluminum that are built to last. Backed by more than 35 years of experience in this industry, our patented engineering designs are the most reliable and easy to use boat lifts that you can find.

## Order Boat Lifts in Vero Beach, FL

Manufactured locally in our Fort Myers, Florida factory, we are proud to be made in America. While our lifts are shipped around the world, it is always a comfort to know that we can meet the needs of our customers in the Vero Beach, FL area.

No matter what type of watercraft you own and what shoreline conditions exist at your home or business, IMM Quality Boat Lifts will build you a lift that perfectly suits your lifestyle. That is why our boat lifts are the preferred choice of discerning customers and have an unsurpassed reputation.

## Benefits of Covered Drive
[Skip to content](https://iqboatlifts.com/benefits-covered-drive/#content "Skip to content")

[Get a Quote](https://iqboatlifts.com/boat-lift-quotes/)

[Call Now 1-800-545-5603](tel:+18005455603)

![The Benefits of a Covered Drive 10](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/05/The-Benefits-of-a-Covered-Drive.jpg)

# The Benefits of a Covered Drive

- [May 19, 2017](https://iqboatlifts.com/2017/05/19/)
- [Boat Lifts](https://iqboatlifts.com/boat-lifts/)

There can be little doubt that Mother Nature will ruin machinery if it is not protected properly. A marine environment is particularly harsh and most people realize how damaging corrosion and electrolysis can be to boats. However, few realize just how vulnerable boat lift drive systems are to environmental degradation. The drive system components that are most vulnerable are the motors, gearboxes and the moving parts (e.g. sprockets, chains, belts, etc.). Let’s take a look at what can happen to unprotected drive systems, especially the motors.

### General Benefits of a Cover

![IMM Quality Boat Lift Cover](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/05/IMM-Quality-Boat-Lift-Cover.jpg)IMM Quality Cover

The IMM Quality Boat Lifts covers have been specially designed to protect and preserve the drive components. The covers are made from high-density polyethylene to provide chemical, U.V. and corrosion resistance. The U.V. protection will minimize fading, sun damage and reflect heat from the sun to lower the surface temperature of the drive components, thus protecting the motors from overheating. We use a roto-molding process to make the covers extra thick to provide the highest level of impact resistance and durability. They will protect your drive components from rocks, lures, limbs, aerial assaults from birds, sea salt, and the elements while keeping everything looking new.

**Harsh marine environment quickly ruins uncovered drive components**

![boat lift drives over time](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/05/boat-lift-drives-over-time.jpg)

The covers also protect the drive components from grime and grit.  The housing of the gear boxes are made from cast aluminum so exposure to the elements simply affects the cosmetic appearance.  However, the drive shaft from the gearbox is made from carbon steel so that it can withstand the torque.  This drive shaft along with its seals is vulnerable to breaking down in a marine environment and protecting them with a cover greatly extends the life of the gearbox.  In addition, the sprockets and many other drive components require lubrication to allow them to turn easily and to protect them from corrosion.

![grit on boat lift motor](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/05/grit-on-boat-lift-motor.jpg)How much grit is on the inside of the motor? This much.

Open drive systems allow the weather to wash away the lubrication, necessitating more frequent [maintenance](https://iqboatlifts.com/boat-lift-maintenance/) with re-application of lubricant, otherwise, the moving parts will make loud noises and will eventually bind.  Open drive systems also allow grit to accumulate on the components which will wear down the sprockets, sheaves and other moving parts much more quickly than when they are protected by a cover.  With all this grime and grit it is a good thing that the IMM Quality covers were designed to be simple to clean using just a mild detergent and water.

### Motors

There are many kinds of motors, but the types most commonly used by boat lift manufacturers are open drip proof (ODP), totally enclosed (either non-ventilated (TENV) or fan cooled (TEFC)), stainless steel and extreme duty washdown motors.

![Extreme Duty Washdown Motor](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/05/Extreme-Duty-Washdown-Motor.jpg)If you can afford it, an extreme duty washdown motor is the absolute best choice for a boat lift.  All exterior components are made of stainless steel, along with weather resistant seals and all the other internal components are engineered to resist environmental contamination and corrosion.  As the name suggests, these motors are designed to be washed down with a hose while they are running.  The only real problem is that they cost four times more than a good TEFC motor.  Most consumers cannot justify spending thousands of dollars more on their boat lift for these premium motors.

![ODP motors](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/05/ODP-motors.jpg)ODP motors are just that – completely open to the environment.  It’s like an open door from whatever is outside, to your bearings, windings and other components on the inside.  Dirt, soot, rain, ocean spray, etc., it all gets inside.  Wildlife and insects are especially fond of nesting inside these motors (mud daubers really love them).  These are the cheapest kind of motor on the market and they do not use weather resistant components.  ODP motors are often used on cheap flat plate drives and are a terrible choice if the drive system is not protected by a well-sealed cover.

![TENV and TEFC motors](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/05/TENV-and-TEFC-motors.jpg)TENV and TEFC are very similar in design.  Although both of these motors are sealed, the gaskets and other materials are not designed to withstand direct exposure to an outside environment.  The main difference between TENV and TEFC is the fan cooling.  Motors get hot while running and the fan cooling extends the continuous runtime before the motor will overheat.  Typically the non-ventilated TENV motors have rated runtimes of 15 minutes, while the fan-cooled TEFC motors are rated as continuous duty (ie. they can be used continuously, 24 hours a day).  TEFC motors are a great, cost-effective choice when used under a cover.

![Stainless Steel Motors](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/05/stainless-steel-motor.jpg)Stainless steel motors are frequently used on boat lifts that do not have covers (most commonly TENV versions).  What you should keep in mind is that only the exterior housing, capacitor case, and conduit box cover are made from stainless steel.  The internal parts are not.  This is important because water condenses on the insides of non-covered motors as they cool after use.  Therefore, even stainless steel motors have drain plugs to allow the accumulated water to drip out.  So even though the outside of a stainless steel motor may look nice and rust free, the inside components are frequently ruined by the condensation.

![The Benefits of a Covered Drive 9](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/05/Rusty-windings-rotor-capacitor-1.jpg)Rusty windings, rotor and capacitor from inside an uncovered stainless steel motor

Using a cover essentially eliminates condensation inside a motor.  The cover greatly slows the cooling of the metal, the cover limits the volume of air around the motor and the cover limits the turnover of moist air around the motor by lowering air flow.  To help you understand why covers eliminate condensation, think about your car and how water can condense on it as dew or frost.  Then think about how cars parked inside garages are protected from this condensation.  Even though the garage is not air tight, is not insulated or heated, cars parked in garages do not get frost (in winter) or dew (in summer) on their windshields on the same night cars parked outside do have condensation.  The same scientific principles protect your boat lift drive components from condensation when they are covered.

### Conclusion

There are many reasons why owning a boat lift that has a cover for the drive components is a wise idea.  Covering the drive components will protect them from the elements and greatly extend their service life.  A cover will also preserve the beauty of your motor and gearbox in addition to increasing the resale value of your lift.  A good cover improves the overall aesthetics of the lift giving a sleek, clean look compared to the clunky, industrial look of exposed machinery.  Given all the benefits of a covered drive, why would anyone choose to do otherwise?

![Google map of boat lifts in Aransas TX](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20750%20464'%3E%3C/svg%3E)

# BOAT LIFTS IN ARANSAS, TX

Are you searching for dependable boat lifts in Aransas, Texas? Your search ends here. We specialize in providing top-tier marine lifts designed to safeguard your valuable vessels and elevate your boating experience. With years of experience and a commitment to excellence, we are your trusted source for boat lifts in Aransas.

## **Why Choose Our Boat Lifts in Aransas, TX**

Our boat lifts offer several benefits for boat owners in Aransas:

**1\. Premium Quality:** We take pride in offering boat lifts built to endure. Our products are crafted using high-quality materials to withstand the demanding marine conditions of Aransas.

**2\. Custom Solutions:** We understand that each boat is unique. That’s why we offer tailor-made boat lift solutions to perfectly accommodate your specific vessel, ensuring a precise fit.

**3\. Expert Installation:** Our team of seasoned professionals is dedicated to installing your boat lift with precision and efficiency, providing you with peace of mind.

**4\. Unparalleled Durability:** Our boat lifts are engineered for long-lasting durability, ensuring your investment remains well-protected.

**5\. Local Knowledge:** With our strong presence in Aransas, we possess invaluable knowledge of the local waterways and conditions, making us the go-to choice for boat lifts.

Ready to enhance your boating experience in Aransas, TX? Feel free to get in touch with us today. Our team is here to address your inquiries, offer quotes, and assist you in finding the perfect boat lift solution for your needs. [Request a Quote](https://iqboatlifts.com/boat-lift-quotes/)

### **Looking for boat lifts in Aransas, TX?![boat lifts in aransas, tx](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20225%20300'%3E%3C/svg%3E)**

Known for typically being a small beach town bordering the Golf Mexico, Aransas is perfect for those who want to enjoy a nice and simple day on the beach or out on the boat. The city is located on Texas’ Mustang Island, where it is a host to a 50-acre national park and miles of beautiful coastline. The surrounding marsh near the city is also perfect fishing and bird watching enthusiasts. Regardless of where you live on Aransas’s beautiful coast, [IMM Quality Boat Lifts](https://iqboatlifts.com/about/) understands the coastal city’s boatlift needs.

IMM Quality Boat Lifts brings the [world’s best boat lifts](https://iqboatlifts.com/boats-lifts/) to Aransas, TX. IMM Quality Boat Lifts offers a variety of boat lifts that are built to last and made from marine grade aluminum. Evidenced by more than 35 years of experience in this industry, our patented engineering designs are the most reliable and easy to use boat lifts that you can find. Manufactured locally in our Fort Myers, Florida factory, we are proud to be made in America.

## Order Boat Lifts in Aransas, TX

While our boat lifts are shipped around the world, it is always a comfort to know that we can meet the needs of our customers in the Aransas Texas area. No matter what type of watercraft you own and what shoreline conditions exist at your home, IMM Quality Boat Lifts will build you a lift that perfectly suits your needs. That is why our boat lifts are the preferred choice of discerning customers and have an unsurpassed reputation that speaks for itself.

## Alumavator Boat Lift
[Skip to content](https://iqboatlifts.com/vertical-lifts/alumavator/#content "Skip to content")

[Get a Quote](https://iqboatlifts.com/boat-lift-quotes/)

[Call Now 1-800-545-5603](tel:+18005455603)

# Alumavator Vertical Boat Lifts

A superbly engineered gear-driven boat lift, the IMM Quality Alumavator Vertical Boat Lift **sets the industry standard** for shafted beam boat lifts. The Alumavator vertical boat lift is chain driven at the winder shaft from a motor-driven gearbox.

Chain drives are the transmission of choice for heavy machinery in industrial, farming, military and marine applications, because of the shock-load ruggedness, efficiency, safety and proven battle-tested dependability. This positive drive system does not suffer from the belt slippage seen with flat plate drives. This is because each link makes a drive contact on the sprocket, spreading the load over many teeth. Chains are **simply the best choice** for the money given the extreme abuse of the marine boat lift application.

[IMM Quality Boat Lifts](https://iqboatlifts.com/about/) takes pride in our engineering and product design expertise, along with our unique capability to thoroughly performance test our lifts before they leave the IMM Quality Boat Lifts factory. Just take a look at the IMM Quality Alumavator boat lift design to see why our vertical boat lifts are **built for a lifetime**.

[Click Here to See Alumavator Vertical Boat Lift Features](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/08/Vator-Platinum-figure.pdf)

## **Alumavator Vertical Boat Lifts Standard Features**

- All aluminum and stainless steel construction
- Fully carpeted wooden bunk boards
- Heavy-duty, rotomolded covers enclose powerheads to extend product life. This protects the mechanical and electrical components from windblown rain and salt spray.
- Custom extruded top-beam step channel adds structural support for the drive-bearing blocks
- Maintenance-free aluminum pulleys with unique self-lubricating bearing
- Maintenance-free aluminum bearing blocks with no-lube Igus bushings
- Grooved aluminum cable winders with cable keepers
- Stainless steel aircraft-grade cables
- Patented wedge locks allow the cables to be pre-wound for easy installation. It also allows the cradle system to be easily adjusted after installation.
- Stainless steel hardware
- Heavy-duty reinforced guide post base with PVC-covered guide posts that is easily adjustable
- Bonita manual controls with GFI Box
- Chain drive system

### **Options**

- The high-speed version is twice as fast
- Custom aluminum bunks covered in white vinyl. IMM Quality Boat Lifts’ bunks are guaranteed not to float and are covered by a 10-year warranty against tearing, fading, mold, and corrosion.
- Track bracing
- Top beam cover
- Walk boards
- Steps
- Stern platforms
- Wireless remote controls, both standard and with auto stops
- Solar power

[Request a Quote](https://iqboatlifts.com/boat-lift-quotes/)

![nelson alumavator highspeed 12](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/05/Nelson-Alumavator-HighSpeed-12.jpg)

![dc marine alumavator 1 lum](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20800%20600'%3E%3C/svg%3E)

![Alumavator,Alumavator Vertical Boat Lifts,Alumavator Boat Lift Prices,Alumavator Vertical Boatlifts for Sale,Alumavator Vertical Boat Lift Repairs,Alumavator Vertical Boatlift Dealer,Alumavator boat lift,Alumavator Boat Lifts](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20800%20598'%3E%3C/svg%3E)

### **Alumavator Vertical Boat Lift Specifications**

Alumavator vertical boat lifts are available in seven sizes in the four-piling configuration, up to 27,000 pounds. The Alumavator boat lift also offers three additional sizes in the eight-piling configuration, up to 54,000 pounds. Specifications are shown in the following chart.

[Alumavator 4-Pile Specification Sheet PDF Download](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/02/Alumavator-4-Post-7-29-16.pdf)

[Alumavator 8-Pile Specification Sheet PDF Download](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/02/Alumavator-8-Post-7-29-16.pdf)

## Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) about Alumavator Vertical Boat Lifts

What makes the Alumavator Vertical Boat Lift unique?

The Alumavator Vertical Boat Lift features an engineered gear-driven mechanism with a chain drive at the winder shaft, offering durability and efficiency.

What are the key features of the Alumavator Vertical Boat Lift?

It includes all aluminum and stainless steel construction, carpeted wooden bunk boards, heavy-duty covers for powerheads, and maintenance-free components, among others.

Are there customization options available for the Alumavator Vertical Boat Lift?

Yes, options include a high-speed version, custom aluminum bunks, wireless remote controls, solar power, and more for additional convenience and performance.

How does the chain drive system benefit the Alumavator Vertical Boat Lift?

Chain drives provide shock-load ruggedness, safety, and dependability, especially in marine applications, by distributing the load over many teeth for reduced slippage.

What sizes and capacities are available for the Alumavator Vertical Boat Lift?

The lift is available in several sizes for four-piling configurations up to 27,000 pounds and eight-piling configurations up to 54,000 pounds.

## Superlift Vertical Boat Lift
[Skip to content](https://iqboatlifts.com/vertical-lifts/superlift/#content "Skip to content")

[Get a Quote](https://iqboatlifts.com/boat-lift-quotes/)

[Call Now 1-800-545-5603](tel:+18005455603)

# SUPERLIFT VERTICAL BOAT LIFTS

From the all-aluminum powerhead cover to its massive beams, one look at the rugged components and it is easy to see that the Superlift vertical boatlift is the finest industrial duty boat lift ever made. The Superlift was designed for extended frequent use in marinas, but it has gained a following among the most discriminating homeowners.

The Superlift vertical boat lift system incorporates a gearless, high-efficiency cycloidal drive that generates 34,700,inch pounds of output torque at an efficiency of greater than 90%. What does this amazing torque and efficiency mean? The cycloidal drives by [IMM Quality Boat Lifts](https://iqboatlifts.com/about/) are the most powerful on the market, and are the most durable drive system available.

Nothing is faster at lifting your boat than the Superlift vertical boatlift, which is more than twice as fast as the nearest competitor’s high speed drive system (see comparison table below). We are so confident in the IMM Quality Superlifts that we offer a lifetime warranty on the cycloidal drive. No other boat lift drive system has a lifetime warranty.

Take a look at our design and you’ll see why IMM Quality Boat Lifts are built for a lifetime. We take pride in our engineering and product design expertise along with our unique capability to thoroughly performance test our lifts before they leave our factory. So, when only the absolute best will do, the IMM Quality Superlift vertical boat lift system is the only choice.

[Click Here to See a Figure of Superlift Features](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/02/superlift.pdf)

## **Superlift Vertical Boat Lift Standard Features**

- All aluminum and stainless steel construction
- Custom aluminum bunks covered in white vinyl. Our bunks are guaranteed not to float and are covered by a 10 year warranty against tearing, fading, mold and corrosion
- Industrial duty, aluminum cover encloses power heads to extend product life by protecting the mechanical and electrical components from windblown rain and salt spray
- Custom extruded top beam step channel adds structural support for the drive bearing blocks
- Maintenance free aluminum pulleys with unique self-lubricating bearing
- Maintenance free aluminum bearing blocks with no lube Igus bushings
- Grooved aluminum cable winders with cable keepers
- Upgraded limp fine wire stainless steel cable like that used in public elevators and ski lifts is extra pliable to minimize work hardening and maximize cable life
- Patented wedge locks allow the cables to be pre-wound for easy installation and allows the cradle system to be easily adjusted after installation.
- Stainless steel hardware
- Heavy duty reinforced guide post base with PVC covered guide post that are easily adjustable
- Gem remote control with handheld transmitter and built-in auto stops enables in-water operation of your boat lift
- Fail-safe electric braking system
- Ultra-efficient industrial duty cycloidal gearless reducers, the finest reducers made, produce more torque and result in the fastest lift speeds on the market.

[Lift Speed Chart for Four Posts Lifts](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/02/liftspeedcomparison.pdf)

## **Options**

- High speed version is twice as fast
- Top beam cover
- Walk boards
- Steps
- Tide guides
- Stern Platforms
- Remote upgrades to allow lighting control
- Solar power

![Large navy and white boat sits on Thaler 2 Superlift vertical boat lift helps this boat avoid salt water damage and fresh water damage](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20768%201024'%3E%3C/svg%3E)

![qsl14k superlift 1](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20768%20576'%3E%3C/svg%3E)

### **Superlift Vertical Boatlift Specifications**

The IMM Quality Superlift boat lift is available in eight sizes in the four-piling configuration, up to 33,000 pounds. The Superlift boatlift is also available in three additional sizes in the eight-piling configuration up to 66,000 pounds.

## Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) on Superlift Vertical Boat Lifts

What distinguishes the Superlift Vertical Boat Lift?

It's designed for industrial use with a gearless, high-efficiency cycloidal drive, offering remarkable speed and durability, ideal for marinas and discerning homeowners.

What are the main features of the Superlift?

Key features include all-aluminum and stainless steel construction, custom aluminum bunks, maintenance-free components, upgraded cables, and a highly efficient cycloidal gearless drive.

Are there customizable options for the Superlift Vertical Boat Lift?

Yes, including high-speed versions, walk boards, top beam cover, tide guides, stern platforms, remote lighting controls, and solar power.

What sizes are available for the Superlift Boat Lift?

Available in eight sizes for the four-piling configuration up to 33,000 pounds, and three additional sizes in the eight-piling configuration up to 66,000 pounds.

How can I get a quote for a Superlift Vertical Boat Lift?

Fill out the form on the webpage to be connected with a local boat lift dealer who will reach out within two business days.

# Boat lifts IN Palm Beach -   IMM Quality Boat Lifts

### **Looking for Boat Lifts in Palm Beach, FL?**

![Google map of boat lifts in Palm Beach FL](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/02/palm-beach-FL-imm-quality-boat-lifts.png)

Thirty-nine vibrant, diverse and welcoming communities make up Palm Beach, FL. Each offers charms all their own. Immerse yourself in the colorful culture and nightlife of West Palm Beach. Soak up the unspoiled beauty of Jupiter. Travel back in time to the Gilded Age in historic Palm Beach.

From sea captains to captains of industry, Palm Beach, FL has welcomed visitors of every stripe from the start. Regardless of where you live in Palm Beach, IMM Quality Boat Lifts understands your city’s boatlift requirements and challenges.

[IMM Quality Boat Lifts](https://iqboatlifts.com/about/) brings the world’s best boat lifts to Palm Beach, FL. IMM Quality Boat Lifts offers a variety of boat lifts made from marine-grade aluminum that are built to last. Backed by more than 35 years of experience in this industry, our patented engineering designs are the most reliable and easy to use boat lifts that you can find.

## Boat Lift Parts in Palm Beach, FL

Manufactured locally in our Fort Myers, Florida factory, we are proud to be made in America. While our lifts are shipped around the world, it is always a comfort to know that we can meet the needs of our customers in the Palm Beach area.

No matter what type of watercraft you own and what shoreline conditions exist at your home or business, IMM Quality Boat Lifts will build you a lift that perfectly suits your lifestyle. That is why our boat lifts are the preferred choice of discerning customers and have an unsurpassed reputation.

# Boat lifts IN Fort Pierce -   IMM Quality Boat Lifts

### **Looking for Boat Lifts in Fort Pierce, FL?**

![Google map of boat lifts in Fort Pierce FL](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20372%20665'%3E%3C/svg%3E)

Fort Pierce is a city on the east coast of Florida. Its oceanfront National Navy SEAL Museum displays weapons, vehicles and other naval artifacts. Nearby, Fort Pierce Inlet State Park has a long beach, where swimming and surfing are popular. The A.E. Backus Museum and Gallery houses paintings by the 20th-century painter, a Fort Pierce native. Heathcote Botanical Gardens features a large collection of tropical bonsai.

Regardless of where you live in Fort Pierce, [IMM Quality Boat Lifts](https://iqboatlifts.com/about/) understands your island city’s boatlift requirements and challenges. IMM Quality Boat Lifts brings the world’s best boat lifts to Fort Pierce, FL.

IMM Quality Boat Lifts offers [a variety of boat lifts](https://iqboatlifts.com/boats-lifts/) made from marine grade aluminum that are built to last. Backed by more than 35 years of experience in this industry, our patented engineering designs are the most reliable and easy to use boat lifts that you can find. Manufactured locally in our Fort Myers, Florida factory, we are proud to be Made in America.

# Meet Our Team at    IMM Quality Boat Lifts

Whatever your boat lift needs may be, set aside time to meet our team at IMM Quality Boat Lifts. Our experienced staff will be happy to help you along every step of the way.

### **When you meet our team, you’ll understand why pride and dedication shows in every product that leaves our factory.**

From manufacturing, service, installation and marina consultation, IMM Quality Boat Lifts has more than thirty years in business doing it all. The high quality of our boat lifts and products comes from our people. It comes from the expert engineers who develop the patented and custom designs. It includes the skilled machinists and fabricators, as well as our customer support staff.
