![Google map of boat lifts in Rockport TX](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/06/Boat-Lifts-in-Rockport-TX.png)

# BOAT LIFTS IN ROCKPORT -   IMM QUALITY BOAT LIFTS

### **Looking for boat lifts in Rockport, TX?**

![Google map of boat lifts in Rockport TX](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/06/Boat-Lifts-in-Rockport-TX.png)

Recognized as one of America’s top 10 beaches, Rockport was originally founded in the early 1600s as territorial claim for the Netherlands in the new world. Today, the entire city is designated as a historic landmark due to its significant architectural and cultural importance.

The city is known for being a host to the country’s oldest seaside resort, seeing over 40,000 visitors a year, even though the local population is only around 3,500 individuals.

There are also several waterfront neighborhoods such as The Cove and Poverty Beach, where visitors and residents alike can enjoy the proximity of the beach and upscale shopping center. Regardless of where you live in Rockport’s beautiful coast, [IMM Quality Boat Lifts](https://iqboatlifts.com/about/) understands the coastal city’s boatlift needs.

## Boat Lifts in Rockport, TX

IMM Quality Boat Lifts brings [the world’s best boat lifts](https://iqboatlifts.com/boats-lifts/) to Rockport, TX. IMM Quality Boat Lifts offers a variety of boat lifts made from marine-grade aluminum that are built to last. Backed by more than 35 years of experience in this industry, our patented engineering designs are the most reliable and easy to use boat lifts that you can find. Manufactured locally in our Fort Myers, Florida factory, we are proud to be made in America.

While our lifts are shipped around the world, it is always a comfort to know that we can meet the needs of our customers in the Rockport area. No matter what type of watercraft you own and what shoreline conditions exist at your home, IMM Quality Boat Lifts will build you a lift that perfectly suits your needs. That is why our boat lifts are the preferred choice of discerning customers and have an unsurpassed reputation that speaks for itself.

# Boat lifts IN Panama City -   IMM Quality Boat Lifts

### **Looking for Boat Lifts in Panama City, FL?**

![Google map of boat lifts in Panama City FL](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/02/panama-city-fl-imm-quality-boat-lifts.png)

Panama City is on St. Andrews Bay, in the Florida Panhandle. The historic St. Andrews district has a marina and seafood restaurants. Across the bay is Panama City Beach, a resort city on the Gulf of Mexico. It’s known for its long white-sand beach and amusement parks.

On the Shell Island peninsula, St. Andrews State Park has beaches, plus nature trails. Dolphins and sea turtles swim in the waters offshore. Regardless of where you live in Panama City, IMM Quality Boat Lifts understands your island city’s boatlift requirements and challenges.

[IMM Quality Boat Lifts](https://iqboatlifts.com/about/) brings [the world’s best boat lifts](https://iqboatlifts.com/boats-lifts/) to Panama City, FL. IMM Quality Boat Lifts offers a variety of boat lifts made from marine grade aluminum that are built to last. Backed by more than 35 years of experience in this industry, our patented engineering designs are the most reliable and easy to use boat lifts that you can find. Manufactured locally in our Fort Myers, Florida factory, we are proud to be made in America.

## Order Boat Lifts in Panama City, FL

While our lifts are shipped around the world, it is always a comfort to know that we can meet the needs of our customers in the Panama City area. No matter what type of watercraft you own and what shoreline conditions exist at your home or business, IMM Quality Boat Lifts will build you a lift that perfectly suits your lifestyle. That is why our boat lifts are the preferred choice of discerning customers and have an unsurpassed reputation.

#### Panama City Boat Lifts Products & Accessories

[![Superlift vertical boat lift by IMM Quality with large white and navy boat sitting above the water on canal](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/05/Superlift-54-2.jpg)](https://iqboatlifts.com/vertical-lifts/)

### [Vertical Lifts](https://iqboatlifts.com/vertical-lifts/)

Capacities from 4,500 to 200,000 pounds and three choices of drive systems.

[Read more](https://iqboatlifts.com/vertical-lifts/)

## 4500 Dual PWC Lift
[Skip to content](https://iqboatlifts.com/4500-dual-pwc/#content "Skip to content")

[Get a Quote](https://iqboatlifts.com/boat-lift-quotes/)

[Call Now 1-800-545-5603](tel:+18005455603)

# 4500 Dual PWC Jetski Lift

The **4500 dual PWC** **jetski lift** is built on an elevator boat lift platform. It has been fitted with a double PWC bunking kit to accommodate two jet skis. The 4500 double PWC jet ski lift for sale by IMM Quality Boat Lifts is available in both vertical and inclined models, along with the option of either single- or two-piece tracks. A center walk plank is included with the 4500 PWC jetski lift to allow easy access to either watercraft. Also included are a pair of four-inch riser brackets, so you can float ski by yourself. IMM Quality Boat Lifts’ superbly engineered, battle-proven designs are the best PWC jetski lifts you’ll find in the industry!

[Click Here to See a Figure of 4500 Dual PWC Jet Ski Lift Features](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/02/4500-dual-pws.pdf)

### **4500 Double PWC Jetski Lift Standard Features**

- All type 6061-T6 aluminum and type 300 stainless steel construction
- Welded construction with grooved gusset plates and reinforcement bolting in key areas
- Fully carpeted wooden bunk boards
- Heavy-duty, rotomolded covers enclose powerheads to extend product life by protecting the mechanical and electrical components from windblown rain and salt spray
- Maintenance-free aluminum bearing blocks with no-lube Igus bushings
- Only IMM Quality uses grooved aluminum cable winders and cable rollers to keep the cable tight on the winder and in the grooves, which dramatically increases cable life
- New extended travel winders allow 20 feet of travel
- Stainless steel aircraft grade cables
- Stainless steel hardware
- Sacrificial zinc anodes to protect against electrolysis
- Heavy-duty reinforced guide post base with PVC-covered guide posts that are easily adjustable
- Bonita manual controls with GFI Box
- Chain drive system

## **Options**

- High-speed version is twice as fast. Also available with the **Platinum** drive.
- Our custom aluminum bunks, covered in white vinyl, are guaranteed not to float. They are covered by a 10-year warranty against tearing, fading, mold and corrosion.
- Single- or two-piece track
- Aluminum dock ladder
- Wireless remote controls, both standard and with auto stops
- Solar power

## **The 4500 Dual PWC JetSki Lift Specifications**

The 4500 Dual PWC jet ski lift is designed to accommodate two PWCs weighing less than 4,500 pounds.

### [4500 Dual PWC Jetski Lifts Specifications PDF Download](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/03/4500-Dual-PWC-Spec-Sheet-2.pdf)

![Two Yamaha jetskis rest above the water on two IMM Quality PWC boat lifts](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/01/photo43.jpg)

![elevator pwc4500 lum](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20800%20600'%3E%3C/svg%3E)

![4500 Dual PWC Jet Ski Lift holds two jet skis above the water at the end of a dock](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%201024%20768'%3E%3C/svg%3E)

## Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) 4500 Dual PWC Jetski Lift

What is the 4500 Dual PWC Jet Ski Lift?

It's an elevator boat lift designed to hold two jet skis, available in vertical and inclined models with various track options. It includes a center walk plank for easy access to both watercraft.

What are the key features of the 4500 Dual PWC Jet Ski Lift?

Features include construction from type 6061-T6 aluminum and type 300 stainless steel, welded construction with grooved gusset plates, fully carpeted wooden bunk boards, maintenance-free aluminum bearing blocks, and more.

What options are available for the 4500 Dual PWC Jet Ski Lift?

Options include a high-speed version, custom aluminum bunks covered in white vinyl, single- or two-piece track, aluminum dock ladder, wireless remote controls, and solar power.

What is the weight capacity of the 4500 Dual PWC Jet Ski Lift?

It is designed to accommodate two personal watercrafts (PWCs) with a total weight of less than 4,500 pounds.

How can I get a quote for the 4500 Dual PWC Jet Ski Lift?

To request an estimate, fill out the form on the website to connect with a local boat lift dealer who will provide information based on your specific needs within two business days.

# Boat lifts IN Port Richey -   IMM Quality Boat Lifts

### **Looking for Boat Lifts in Port Richey, FL?**

![Google map of boat lifts in Port Richey, FL](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/02/port-richey-fl-imm-quality-boat-lifts.png)

Located in west-central Pasco County, New Port Richey encompasses a total area of 4.6 miles. The Gulf of Mexico coastline borders the west side of the city, and the Pithlachascotee River runs through the city’s heart. New Port Richey is considered part of the Tampa Bay area, a popular tourist destination with major attractions, recreation, sports, and culture. Regardless of where you live in Port Richey, IMM Quality Boat Lifts understands your island city’s boatlift requirements and challenges.

[IMM Quality Boat Lifts](https://iqboatlifts.com/about/) brings [the world’s best boat lifts](https://iqboatlifts.com/boats-lifts/) to Port Richey, FL. IMM Quality Boat Lifts offers a variety of boat lifts made from marine-grade aluminum that are built to last. Backed by more than 35 years of experience in this industry, our patented engineering designs are the most reliable and easy to use boat lifts that you can find. Manufactured locally in our Fort Myers, Florida factory, we are proud to be made in America.

## Order Boat Lifts in Port Richey, FL

While our lifts are shipped around the world, it is always a comfort to know that we can meet the needs of our customers in the Port Richey area. No matter what type of watercraft you own and what shoreline conditions exist at your home or business, IMM Quality Boat Lifts will build you a lift that perfectly suits your lifestyle. That is why our boat lifts are the preferred choice of discerning customers and have an unsurpassed reputation.

## Elite Cargo Lift
[Skip to content](https://iqboatlifts.com/elite-cargo-lift/#content "Skip to content")

[Get a Quote](https://iqboatlifts.com/boat-lift-quotes/)

[Call Now 1-800-545-5603](tel:+18005455603)

# Elite Cargo Lifts

Are you tired of making multiple trips up and down the stairs? Let the ELITE cargo lift help you take out the trash or bring up the groceries.

**The Elite cargo lift was engineered to exceed your needs.**

- 1000 lb. capacity
- Spacious 4’ by 4’ basket
- Lift speed is 21 feet per minute
- Dual mast design for extra stability and safety (5” I-Beams)
- All aluminum construction
- Compact head assembly requires less overhead clearance, can be installed 3’ lower than competitors
- Stainless steel motor and hardware
- Stainless steel aircraft-grade cables
- 5 year structural warranty, 2 year motor and gearbox warranty

![elite](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/Elite.webp)

![cargo](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/cargo.webp)

Increase the value of your home and your quality of life with an Elite cargo
lift!

**The Elite cargo lift comes fully loaded**

- Intelligent digital control system with built-in failsafes

  - In basket control panel plus top and bottom call stations
  - Uses digital proximity switches to control auto-stops instead of mechanical rotary limits.
  - Electronic door lock prevents accidental gate opening when basket is in motion and when stopped between floors

- Up to 3 gates and 3 programmed auto-stop positions
- Includes two remote control key fobs
- Industry first, passenger elevator emergency brake. Will stop fully loaded basket within 1 inch, in the event of a lift cable failure.
- Safety pan switch stops basket upon any contact with an object.

[![img 6](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/img-6.webp)](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/img-6.webp)

[![img 1](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/img-1-2.webp)](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/img-1-2.webp)

![Google map of boat lifts in Galveston TX](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/06/Boat-Lifts-in-Galveston-TX.png)

# BOAT LIFTS IN GALVESTON -   IMM QUALITY BOAT LIFTS

## **Looking for boat lifts in Galveston, TX?**

### **![Google map of boat lifts in Galveston, TX](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/06/Boat-Lifts-in-Galveston-TX.png)**

Recognized as Houston’s top beach destination, Galveston is an island city that houses a wide variety of attractions centered on its proximity to the water. The city is known for being the host of Moody Gardens, an amusement parks known for its giant glass pyramids that house sharks, monkeys, and other exotic animals. Galveston also offers residents and visitors alike a multitude of other activities like fishing in Galveston Island State Park or enjoying a fun day of carnival rides on Galveston’s Historic Please Pier.

There are also several waterfront neighborhoods such as Seabrook and Trinity Bay, where all can enjoy the proximity of the beach. Regardless of where you live in Galveston’s beautiful coast, [IMM Quality Boat Lifts](https://iqboatlifts.com/about/) understands the coastal city’s boatlift needs.

IMM Quality Boat Lifts brings [the world’s best boat lifts](https://iqboatlifts.com/boats-lifts/) to Galveston, TX. IMM Quality Boat Lifts offers a variety of boat lifts made from marine grade aluminum that are built to last. Backed by more than 35 years of experience in this industry, our patented engineering designs are the most reliable and easy-to-use boat lifts that you can find. Manufactured locally in our Fort Myers, Florida factory, we are proud to be made in America.

### Order Boat Lifts in Galveston, TX

While our lifts are shipped around the world, it is always a comfort to know that we can meet the needs of our customers in the Galveston area. No matter what type of watercraft you own and what shoreline conditions exist at your home, IMM Quality Boat Lifts will build you a lift that perfectly suits your needs. That is why our boat lifts are the preferred choice of discerning customers and have an unsurpassed reputation that speaks for itself.

## Buying a Boat Guide
[Skip to content](https://iqboatlifts.com/consider-buying-boat/#content "Skip to content")

![buying a boat](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/01/What-to-Consider-When-Buying-a-Boat.jpg)

# What to Consider When Buying a Boat

- [January 24, 2018](https://iqboatlifts.com/2018/01/24/)
- [General Interest](https://iqboatlifts.com/general-interest/)

You’ve decided it’s time.

Time to live out your dreams.

Time to sail the open seas.

Time to buy a boat.

If you’ve decided to buy a boat, you’re in good company. In 2016, there were [3.65 billion dollars](https://www.statista.com/statistics/184587/number-of-recreational-boats-in-the-us/) of recreational boat sales.

But how do you decide exactly which boat to buy?

If you’re thinking of buying a boat, then keep reading. This article covers useful questions to ask yourself when buying a boat.

## Why Are You Buying a Boat?

From fishing boats to speed boats to houseboats. There are many different types of vessels to choose from when buying a boat.

What kind of activities do you want to do? Is it for deepsea fishing, or to take a relaxing cruise on a Sunday afternoon?

Maybe it’s the adrenaline rush you get from a speedboat that you’re looking for.

Ever consider living on a boat? Maybe do a little [island hopping](https://www.yachtingmagazine.com/island-hopping-made-easy)? Yes, there are even boats for that.

Make a list of all the things you want to do, and don’t hold back – there’s a boat for everything you could possibly dream of doing.

## Who Is The Boat For?

Next, decide who you will be inviting on this boat. Maybe you want a smaller two-man fishing boat for just you and your significant other.

Or maybe you are buying a boat to take a group of your best friends out for a social gathering on a 22-foot speedboat.

How many people you plan on having on your boat will help you determine what size of boat you should buy.

## When Will Your Boat Be Used?

Of course, we know you’ll be using the boat on beautiful, sunny days, but what about the days that you aren’t able to be on the water. Where will you keep it?

This is important to think about because there is a lot that goes into the storage and [winterization of a boat](https://iqboatlifts.com/5-important-tips-winterizing-boat/).

Do you have a place to store your boat during the offseason? How will you get it there?

Is your boat going to be kept at a vacation home? If so, you will need to consider if you need a [custom dock and gangway](https://iqboatlifts.com/floating-docks-and-gangways/).

## How Will You Purchase Your Boat?

Buying a boat is a big decision. It can also be an expensive decision.

There are different boats for every kind of budget. Boat prices can range anywhere from $10,000 up to $70,000 and beyond.

Do some research on different brands. Certain brands will be more expensive, while lesser known brands may be good enough, but more affordable.

Also, consider buying a used boat, or sharing the boat with other people you trust to keep the costs low.

## Time To Set Sail

The great thing about boating is it is completely custom and individualized to whatever adventure you are dreaming of.

Have questions or concerns regarding docking and boat lifts? Relax, [we’re here to help](https://iqboatlifts.com/contact/) in any way we can.

So get out there already! Get the boat you’ve been eyeing, invite your friends along.

## SEARCH OUR SITE

Search

![Google map of boat lifts in Dallas TX](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20840%20508'%3E%3C/svg%3E)

# BOAT LIFTS IN DALLAS -   IMM QUALITY BOAT LIFTS

## **Looking for Boat Lifts in Dallas, TX?**

### ![Google map of boat lifts in Dallas TX](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/10/boat-lifts-dallas-tx.png)

Dallas was originally founded in 1941 as a trade post settlement in the newly created Republic of Texas. Known for it’s strong and independent culture, the city is the third largest in the state of Texas and is home to a wide variety of companies and neighborhoods. Dallas is home to everything from the State Fair of Texas, which has been held in the city annually since 1886, to the up-and-coming Art District which is anchored by the Dallas Museum of Art.

From the 1,000-acre White Rock Lake to the even larger Lewisville Lake, the citizens of Dallas can also spend a day boating or doing other water sports in the warm Texas sun. No matter if you’re on the larger lakes or a smaller body of water in the Dallas area, [IMM Quality Boat Lifts](https://iqboatlifts.com/boats-lifts/) understands Dallas and its boat lift needs. The neighborhoods we serve include:

- Preston Hollow
- Russwood Acres
- Greenway Parks
- Northeast Dallas
- Westlake
- Bluffview West
- Highland Park
- Oak Tree
- Timarron
- Northaven Park

IMM Quality Boat Lifts brings [the world’s best boat lifts](https://iqboatlifts.com/about/) to Dallas, TX. IMM Quality Boat Lifts offers a variety of boat lifts made from marine grade aluminum that are built to last. Backed by more than 35 years of experience in this industry, our patented engineering designs are the most reliable and easy to use boat lifts that you can find. Manufactured in our Fort Myers, Florida factory, we are proud to be made in America.

That is why our boat lifts are the preferred choice of discerning customers and have an unsurpassed reputation that speaks for itself.

# Boat lifts IN Kiawah Island -   IMM Quality Boat Lifts

### **Looking for Boat Lifts in Kiawah Island, NC?**

![Google map of boat lifts in Kiawah Island, NC](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/02/kiawah-island-nc-imm-quality-boat-lifts.png)

Kiawah is a sea island, or barrier island, on the Atlantic coast of the United States. Located 25 miles southwest of Charleston in Charleston County, South Carolina, it is primarily a private beach and golf resort. It is home to the Kiawah Island Golf Resort, with spacious villas, beaches, large and acclaimed golf courses, and other attractions.

As of the 2010 census, Kiawah Island’s population was 1,626, up from 1,163 at the 2000 census. The island is part of the Charleston-North Charleston-Summerville metropolitan area. Regardless of where you live in Kiawah Island, [IMM Quality Boat Lifts](https://iqboatlifts.com/boats-lifts/) understands your island city’s boatlift requirements and challenges.

IMM Quality Boat Lifts brings [the world’s best boat lifts](https://iqboatlifts.com/about/) to Kiawah Island, NC. IMM Quality Boat Lifts offers a variety of boat lifts made from marine grade aluminum that are built to last. Backed by more than 35 years of experience in this industry, our patented engineering designs are the most reliable and easy to use boat lifts that you can find. Manufactured locally in our Fort Myers, Florida factory, we are proud to be Made in America.

## Titan Yacht Lifts
[Skip to content](https://iqboatlifts.com/titan-yacht-lifts/#content "Skip to content")

[Get a Quote](https://iqboatlifts.com/boat-lift-quotes/)

[Call Now 1-800-545-5603](tel:+18005455603)

# Titan Yacht Lifts

The ultimate boat lift on the market, our **luxury line of Titan yacht boat lifts** sets a new standard for **performance, safety, and reliability** to lift even the largest of yachts. Introduced in 2010, these Titan yacht lifts all use cycloidal drives, which are the most efficient drives in the industry. This type of drive maximizes output torque and lift speeds.

Consider a “ **Best of the Best**” design, IMM Quality’s Titan yacht lift has completely custom engineered bunk and cradle systems to fit your yacht. Our yacht lifts for sale come standard with all the bells and whistles.

[Click Here to See a Figure of Titan Yacht Lift Features](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/02/Titan.pdf)

## **Standard Features**

- All type 6061-T6 aluminum and type 300 stainless steel construction
- Fully custom aluminum bunks and cradle system. The bunk and cradle systems are engineered in consultation with the yacht manufacturer to provide the perfect fit and proper hull support
- Completely enclosed aluminum upper beams with tinted inspection windows cover the powerheads to extend product life by protecting the mechanical and electrical components from windblown rain and salt spray

Powder-coated to match any color
- Large radius, maintenance-free aluminum pulleys with unique self-lubricating bearing
- Maintenance-free aluminum bearing blocks with no-lube Igus bushings
- Solid drive pipes and solid aluminum grooved cable winders, with cable keeping rollers that are unique to IMM Quality Boat Lifts
- Upgraded limp fine wire stainless steel cable like that used in public elevators and ski lifts is extra-pliable to minimize work hardening and maximize cable life.
- Stainless steel hardware
- Larger diameter, heavy-duty reinforced guide post base with PVC-covered guideposts that are easily adjustable
- Variable-speed PLC controls enable soft start and stops with self-leveling and multiple stop-point features and a handheld transmitter enables in-water operation of your boat lift
- Available with smartphone integration, another industry first by IMM Quality Boat Lifts
- Fail-safe electric braking system
- Ultra-efficient industrial duty cycloidal gearless reducers, the finest reducers made, produce more torque and result in the fastest yacht lift speeds on the market.

So when only the absolute best will do, the IMM Quality Titan yacht lift is the only choice. Take a look at our design to see why IMM Quality Titan yacht lifts are built for a lifetime. Please call our custom design team today to discuss your luxury yacht boat lift needs.

## **Specifications**

The _**Titan Yacht Lift**_ is a fully custom boat lift that can be engineered to accommodate even the largest yachts on the market.

### [Titan Yacht Lifts Spec Sheet PDF Download](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/02/Titan-600115.pdf)

## Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) of Titan Yacht Lifts

What sets the Titan yacht lifts apart in the market?

The Titan yacht lifts are distinguished by their luxury design and high performance, utilizing cycloidal drives which are known for being the most efficient in the industry. This technology maximizes output torque and lift speeds, making these lifts ideal for even the largest yachts. Introduced in 2010, the Titan line is considered the best in terms of performance, safety, and reliability.

What are the key features of the Titan yacht lift?

Titan yacht lifts come with numerous high-end features including 6061-T6 aluminum and 300 type stainless steel construction, fully custom aluminum bunks and cradle systems, maintenance-free aluminum pulleys with self-lubricating bearings, powder-coated finishes available in any color, variable-speed PLC controls with soft start and stop, and fail-safe electric braking systems. These features ensure a perfect fit, exceptional durability, and user-friendly operation.

How does the custom engineering process work for a Titan yacht lift?

The bunk and cradle systems of the Titan yacht lift are custom engineered in consultation with the yacht manufacturer to ensure the perfect fit and proper hull support. This tailored approach involves detailed discussions and planning to meet the specific needs and specifications of each yacht, providing a personalized and effective lifting solution.

Can the Titan yacht lift be operated remotely?

Yes, the Titan yacht lift features a handheld transmitter for in-water operation, allowing for greater convenience and flexibility. It also offers the option for smartphone integration, which is another industry-first by IMM Quality Boat Lifts. These technologies enable users to operate their yacht lift remotely, enhancing the ease of use and accessibility.

What safety features are included in the Titan yacht lift?

Safety is a paramount concern with Titan yacht lifts, which include an enclosed aluminum upper beam to protect mechanical and electrical components from the elements, a fail-safe electric braking system, and ultra-efficient industrial-duty cycloidal gearless reducers. These features ensure the lift operates safely under various conditions, providing peace of mind to yacht owners.

# Boat lifts IN San Diego -   IMM Quality Boat Lifts

### Looking for Boat Lifts in San Diego, CA?

![San Diego Ca Boat Lifts Maps](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/san-diego-ca-boat-lifts-maps.jpg)

Recognized for its beaches, parks and warm climate, San Diego lies on the Pacific coast of California. San Diego is home to a large naval fleet in one of their deeper harbors. This harbor also holds an aircraft carrier turned into a museum called the USS Midway. All sorts of museums are located in Balboa Park, which is where you will find the famous San Diego Zoo.

Regardless of where you live in San Diego’s beautiful coast, [IMM Quality Boat Lifts](https://iqboatlifts.com/about/) understands the coastal city’s boatlift needs. IMM Quality Boat Lifts brings [the world’s best boat lifts](https://iqboatlifts.com/boats-lifts/) to San Diego, CA.

The company offers a variety of boat lifts made from marine-grade aluminum that are built to last. Backed by more than 40 years of experience in this industry, our patented engineering designs are the most reliable and easy-to-use boat lifts that you can find. Manufactured locally in our Fort Myers, Florida factory, we are proud to be made in America.

## Buy Boat Lifts in San Diego, CA

While our lifts are shipped around the world, it is always a comfort to know that we can meet the needs of our customers in the San Diego area. No matter what type of watercraft you own and what shoreline conditions exist at your home, IMM Quality Boat Lifts will build you a lift that perfectly suits your needs.

Our many years of expertise in handling the challenging  environment will insure that you get the best service that you and your family deserve. That is why our boat lifts are the preferred choice of discerning customers and have an unsurpassed reputation that speaks for itself.

[![Small image of large covered boathouse lift](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/04/Boathouse-10.jpg)](https://iqboatlifts.com/boat-house-lifts/)

### [Boat House Lifts](https://iqboatlifts.com/boat-house-lifts/)

Our boathouse lifts can be built to be a structural part of your boathouse using custom stringer brackets welded to the top of a beamed boat lift.

[Read more](https://iqboatlifts.com/boat-house-lifts/)

[![Small blurry photo of floating docks available for sale](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/04/floatingdocks01.jpg)](https://iqboatlifts.com/floating-docks-and-gangways/)

### [Floating Docks and Gangways](https://iqboatlifts.com/floating-docks-and-gangways/)

Our gangways, docks, and piers all start with the same rugged frames made from marine grade aluminum that is incredibly strong and stable.

[Read more](https://iqboatlifts.com/floating-docks-and-gangways/)

# Boat lifts IN Crystal river -   IMM Quality Boat Lifts

### **Looking for Boat Lifts in Crystal River, FL?**

![Google maps of boat lifts in Crystal River, FL](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/02/crystal-river-fl-imm-quality-boat-lifts.png)

Crystal River is a coastal city in western Florida. Kings Bay, which is fed by springs, is home to the Crystal River National Wildlife Refuge, sheltering manatees year-round. Boardwalks at Three Sisters Springs Wildlife Refuge offer views of the marine mammal and the natural springs. Northwest is Crystal River Archaeological State Park, with remains of an early Native American settlement, including ceremonial mounds.

Regardless of where you live in Crystal River, [IMM Quality Boat Lifts](https://iqboatlifts.com/about/) understands your island city’s boatlift requirements and challenges. IMM Quality Boat Lifts brings [the world’s best boat lifts](https://iqboatlifts.com/boats-lifts/) to Crystal River, FL.

IMM Quality Boat Lifts offers a variety of boat lifts made from marine-grade aluminum that are built to last. Backed by more than 35 years of experience in this industry, our patented engineering designs are the most reliable and easy to use boat lifts that you can find. Manufactured locally in our Fort Myers, Florida factory, we are proud to be made in America.

## Order Boat Lifts in Crystal River, FL

While our lifts are shipped around the world, it is always a comfort to know that we can meet the needs of our customers in the Crystal River area. No matter what type of watercraft you own and what shoreline conditions exist at your home or business, IMM Quality Boat Lifts will build you a lift that perfectly suits your lifestyle. That is why our boat lifts are the preferred choice of discerning customers and have an unsurpassed reputation.

## Marine Railway Boat Lifts
[Skip to content](https://iqboatlifts.com/marine-railway-lifts/#content "Skip to content")

[Get a Quote](https://iqboatlifts.com/boat-lift-quotes/)

[Call Now 1-800-545-5603](tel:+18005455603)

# Marine Railway Boat Lifts Track System

The Marine Railway Boat Lifts are ideal for beach access or other gradual slope conditions where there are no deep water docks or seawalls. This unique type of lift is often used to pull boats or seaplanes onto dry land, into boat houses or inside garages. Often referred to as a “boat railroad” our system consists of type 6061-T6 aluminum rails on which a low profile carriage with vinyl covered aluminum bunks carries your boat and is powered by an electric push-pull drive. These systems are truly unique, so don’t hesitate to contact our custom design team to build a **Marine Railway** system that accommodates your boat lifting needs. Take a look at our design and see why **IQ** boat lifts are **Built for a Lifetime**.

We specialize in providing top-quality marine railway lifts and accessories to boat owners around the world. Our selection of boat lift rail systems, boat railway systems, boat tracks, sliding rail systems, boat railing systems, and boat dock rail systems is designed to meet the needs of boaters of all types and sizes.

Our boat lift rail systems are designed to make it easy and safe to lift your boat out of the water and onto your dock. We offer a wide range of options to suit your needs, including vertical lifts, cantilever lifts, and hydraulic lifts. Our boat railway systems are perfect for transporting your boat from the water to a storage area. They use a series of tracks and wheels to move your boat smoothly and safely.

Our boat tracks are designed to guide your boat into a specific location with ease. Our sliding rail systems allow you to move your boat across the water with minimal effort, while our boat railing systems provide safety and stability for your passengers. Our boat dock rail systems are designed to keep your boat secure while moored, giving you peace of mind when you’re not on board.

At IQ Boat Lifts, we pride ourselves on providing exceptional customer service and support. We are committed to helping you find the right boat lift rail system, boat railway system, boat track, sliding rail system, boat railing system, or boat dock rail system for your needs.

[**Contact us today**](https://iqboatlifts.com/contact/) to learn more about our products and services and how we can help you enjoy your time on the water.

[Click Here to See a Figure of Marine Railway Features](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/02/marinerailway.pdf)

## **Boat Lift Railway Track System Standard Features**

- All type 6061-T6 aluminum and type 300 stainless steel construction
- Low-profile carriage with heavy-duty nylon rollers
- Our custom aluminum bunks, covered in white vinyl, are guaranteed not to float. They are covered by a 10-year warranty against tearing, fading, mold and corrosion
- Maintenance-free aluminum pulleys with unique self-lubricating bearing
- Maintenance-free aluminum bearing blocks with no-lube Igus bushings
- Stainless steel aircraft grade cables
- Stainless steel turn buckle to adjust cable tension
- Stainless steel electric motor push-pull power drive
- Stainless steel hardware
- Heavy-duty reinforced guide post base with PVC-covered guide post that are easily adjustable
- Gem remote control with handheld transmitter and built-in auto-stops enables in-water operation of your marine railway boat lift

![marine railway,marine railway boat lifts,IMM Quality Boat Lifts,boat lifts](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20306%20450'%3E%3C/svg%3E)

## **Specifications**

The _**Marine Railway Boat Lifts**_ are available in three sizes, up to 10,000 pounds. Custom IMM Quality marine railway lifts for larger boats are available through our design services.

### [Marine Railway Lifts Spec Sheet PDF Download](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/02/marinerailway.pdf)

## Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) for Marine Railway Boat Lifts

What conditions are Marine Railway Boat Lifts ideal for?

They are perfect for areas with beach access or gradual slope conditions lacking deep water docks or seawalls.

What types of vessels can use the Marine Railway Boat Lift?

This lift is versatile, suitable for both boats and seaplanes, facilitating easy transition onto dry land, into boat houses, or garages.

How is the Marine Railway Boat Lift constructed?

The system uses type 6061-T6 aluminum rails and a low-profile carriage with vinyl-covered aluminum bunks, powered by an electric push-pull drive.

Can the Marine Railway system be customized?

Yes, a custom design team is available to create a Marine Railway system tailored to specific boat lifting needs.

What additional rail systems does IQ Boat Lifts offer?

Besides Marine Railway Lifts, they offer a variety of rail systems including boat lift rails, boat tracks, sliding rail systems, and boat dock rails, designed for safety, ease, and securing boats.

# Ready for Export!

- [September 2, 2020](https://iqboatlifts.com/2020/09/02/)
- [Boat Lifts](https://iqboatlifts.com/boat-lifts/)

Our Made in America products are the finest in the world. Our commitment to quality and durability is getting our products noticed the world over. Made in our factories in Fort Myers, Fl,

IMM Quality Boat Lifts ships our products to the four corners of the world. Whether it’s Canada, Mexico, South America, Europe, Africa, or Asia, we have you covered. We freight orders all over North America, with this recent order on its way to Canada. We are conveniently located close to the port of Miami, which allows us to send our boat lifts to any port in the world via cargo containers. If you want American Made style and world-class durability for your boat lift, your best choice is IMM Quality.

# BOAT LIFTS IN MIAMI FL -   IMM QUALITY BOAT LIFTS

### **Looking for boat lifts in Miami, FL?**

![Google map of boat lifts in Miami FL](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/Boat-Lifts-Miami-FL.png)

Miami was founded in 1825 by Julia DeForest Tuttle, making it the only major city in the country to be founded by a woman. Known as the unofficial capital of Latin America, Miami is a host to a wide array of entertainment, cultural venues and Hispanic restaurants. Fine dining ranges from simple, yet delicious Cuban sandwiches to Peruvian ceviche on Miami Beach.

The city also has different festivals throughout the year like the renowned Art Deco Weekend, Miami Fashion Festival and Ultra Music Festival. Miami is also well known for its famous beachfront neighborhoods like the Venetian Islands and South Beach. No matter where you live in Miami’s beautiful coast, [IMM Quality Boat Lifts](https://iqboatlifts.com/about/) understands the coastal city’s boat lift needs.

IMM Quality Boat Lifts brings **the world’s best boat lifts** to Miami, FL. IMM Quality Boat Lifts offers a [variety of boat lifts](https://iqboatlifts.com/boats-lifts/) made from marine grade aluminum that are built to last. Backed by more than 35 years of experience in this industry, our patented engineering designs are the most reliable and easy to use boat lifts that you can find.

## Boat Lifts for Sale in Miami, FL

Manufactured locally in our Fort Myers, Florida factory, we are proud to be made in America. While our lifts are shipped around the world, it is always a comfort to know that we can meet the needs of our customers in the Miami area.

No matter what type of watercraft you own and what shoreline conditions exist at your home, IMM Quality Boat Lifts will build you a lift that perfectly suits your needs. That is why our boat lifts are the preferred choice of discerning customers and have an unsurpassed reputation that speaks for itself.

## Boathouse Lift Solutions
[Skip to content](https://iqboatlifts.com/boathouse-lift-solutions/#content "Skip to content")

[Get a Quote](https://iqboatlifts.com/boat-lift-quotes/)

[Call Now 1-800-545-5603](tel:+18005455603)

![red and white boat uses boathouse lift solution by IMM Quality](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/boathouse-lift-solutions-blog.jpg)

# Boathouse Lift Solutions

- [October 14, 2020](https://iqboatlifts.com/2020/10/14/)
- [Boat Lifts](https://iqboatlifts.com/boat-lifts/)

![boathouse lift solutions](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/boathouse-lift-solutions-introduction.jpg)

IMM Quality Boat Lifts has a long tradition of engineering excellence. Our company makes use of this expertise to custom design boat lift solutions that perfectly fit your property. If you have been working with another boat lift company and you have gotten the feeling that they want to sell you a “one size fits all” solution, please give us a ring and talk to our engineering design team. We will make sure that you get a custom lift design that best suits your needs. With an IMM Quality boat lift, you can rest assured that you are getting the best-engineered boat lift on the market.

Sometimes, putting a lift into a boathouse can be rather difficult. Many of our competitor’s designs require the lift to be made a permanent part of the boathouse structure. Their boat lift top beams are made with risers that support the boathouse roof structural framing. Therefore, to replace the lift, you must literally take the roof off the boathouse. Or what if the boathouse was made before you were able to install a boat lift? Again, you would have to remove the roof before installing these kinds of lifts. We have always felt that this was a poor engineering solution. The engineers at IMM Quality Boat Lifts have developed solutions for boathouses that will give you many options to choose from. Why let another company force you to tear your boathouse roof off when IMM Quality can provide you a boat lift for your existing boathouse that is safe, durable and easy to use.

![boathouse lift from the side](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/boathouse-lift-solutions-side-view.jpg)

Our customer on Flathead Lake in Bigfork, Montana wanted to install a boat lift into a beautiful boathouse that he was building. This boathouse had some unusual design features. None of the piles went above the level of the dock’s decking. The boathouse was framed with large timber beams that were secured to the dock framing. The structural beams that run parallel with the slip have decking directly below them. This prevents hanging the boatlift from beneath these structural beams because the decking would be in the way of the cables and cradles.

![structural solutions for boathouse lift](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/boathouse-lift-structural-solutions.jpg)

![structural beams on boathouse lift](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/boathouse-lift-structural-beams-solutions-.jpg)

Our first suggestion was to hang the boatlift from the structural beams that run across the slip. Due to the location of the cross-members and the center of gravity of the boat, this choice would have required the boat to be located “off-center” within the boathouse. The customer did not like the look of this solution. Therefore, we suggested using side-mount brackets with standard top beams. These brackets allow the installation of the top beams parallel with the slip, but move the cable drop away from the decking, out over the water.

![side mount bracket on boathouse lift](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/boathouse-lift-side-mount-bracket.jpg)

Here is a side mount bracket.

![engineered drawing of boathouse lift side mount bracket](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/boathouse-lift-engineered-drawing-of-side-mount-bracket.jpg)

Here is the engineered drawing of a side mount bracket.

![boathouse lift side mount brackets in use](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/boathouse-lift-side-mount-bracket-allowing-installation-of-starndard-top-beams.jpg)

And here is a picture showing how the side mount brackets allow the installation of standard top beams to the side of structural beams.

Once the customer was happy with how the boat lift would be mounted to the boathouse structure, our design team made sure that everything else made sense. The customer provided the dimensions of the dock and boathouse. He provided the type of boat and mentioned that he might like to upgrade to a bigger boat in the future. From this information, our engineers created a slip layout and custom-designed the top beam’s length, capacity and winder position to accommodate the largest size boat that could conceivably fit within the customer’s boathouse. These custom modifications resulted in the boat lift top beams being cantilevered with a cable drop forward of the side mount brackets. This will give the customer some room to grow.

![slip layout with boat lift design](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/boathouse-lift-engineered-drawing-.jpg)

Slip layout with boat lift design to maximize boat size within boathouse.

All that was left was to install the lift, get a boat on it, and enjoy the time on Flathead Lake! Great job by all involved.

![boathouse lift project ](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/boathouse-lift-structural-solutions-work.jpg)

![boathouse lift structural solutions](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/boathouse-lift-structural-solutions-raised.jpg)

![boathouse lift from imm quality boat lifts](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/boathouse-lift-solutions-side-view-raised.jpg)

![view of new boathouse lift](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/boathouse-lift-structural-solutions2.jpg)

![boathouse lift with boat](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/boathouse-lift-structural-solutions4.jpg)

![boathouse lift with boat raised](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/boathouse-lift-structural-solutions5.jpg)

![beautiful boathouse lift by imm quality boat lifts](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/boathouse-lift-structural-solutions6.jpg)

## Boat House Lifts
[Skip to content](https://iqboatlifts.com/boat-house-lifts/#content "Skip to content")

[Get a Quote](https://iqboatlifts.com/boat-lift-quotes/)

[Call Now 1-800-545-5603](tel:+18005455603)

# Boat House Lifts

IMM Quality Boat Lifts has many solutions for your boat house lift needs. Our boathouse lifts can be built to be a structural part of your **boathouse** by using custom stringer brackets welded to the top of a beamed boat lift to support the outer support bands of the roofing system.

We can retrofit your existing **boathouse** using custom welded side mounting brackets. Boathouse lifts hanger bearings are the most common and effective way to mount a boat house lift inside a new or existing structure. The bearings are fastened to the hanger assembly, which then slides over the stringer bands of the **boathouse**. Once in place, the brackets are fastened to the bands using stainless steel bolts and require no drilling of the bands. Suspension brackets allow you to hang a standard 4-pile lift in various positions along overhead support beams and give full adjustability in all directions.

## **Revolutionize Your Boating Experience with Our Custom Boat House Lift Designs and Construction**

If you’re a boating enthusiast, you know the importance of having a reliable boat house lift. A well-designed and constructed boat house lift ensures that your boat remains safe and secure, while also making it easy to launch and retrieve. At Boat House Lifts, we understand the needs of boaters and offer custom construction solutions for boat house lifts that are tailored to your specific needs. Whether you need a new lift built from scratch or want to upgrade your existing setup, our team of experts can help you design and build a lift that is both functional and visually appealing. With our years of experience and commitment to quality craftsmanship, you can trust us to deliver the best possible boat house lift solution for your needs.

## **Design Your Dream Floating Boat House: Custom-Built to Your Specifications**

Floating boat houses have become increasingly popular among boating enthusiasts in recent years. These unique structures offer the perfect solution for those who want to keep their boat close at hand while enjoying the comforts of a waterfront home. The construction of a floating boat house involves several key elements, including the use of buoyant materials, a sturdy foundation, and a well-designed structure that can withstand the elements.

One of the main advantages of a floating boat house is its ability to rise and fall with the tide. This makes it an ideal choice for those who live in areas with changing water levels. The buoyancy of the materials used in the construction of the boat house allows it to remain stable and secure even during high tides or rough weather conditions.

When it comes to the construction of a floating boat house, it’s important to work with experienced professionals who understand the unique challenges involved. Factors such as water depth, current, and wind speed must all be taken into consideration during the design process. Additionally, the use of high-quality materials and construction techniques is essential for ensuring that the structure remains safe and secure over time.

Overall, a well-built floating boat house offers a unique and enjoyable way to live the waterfront lifestyle. With careful planning and expert construction, these structures can provide a comfortable and secure home for both you and your boat.

[Click Here to See a Figure of Boat House Lifts Features](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/02/boathouse.pdf)

## **Standard Features**

- Available with Chain, Platinum or Superlift drive systems
- Custom configurations available to meet your local code requirements
- All type 6061-T6 aluminum and type 300 stainless steel construction
- Custom aluminum bunks covered in white vinyl. Our bunks are guaranteed not to float and are covered by a 10 year warranty against tearing, fading, mold and corrosion
- Heavy duty, rotomolded cover encloses power heads to extend product life by protecting the mechanical and electrical components from windblown rain and salt spray
- Grooved aluminum cable winders with cable keepers
- Maintenance free aluminum pulleys with unique self-lubricating bearing
- Maintenance free aluminum bearing blocks with no lube Igus bushings
- Stainless steel aircraft grade cables
- Stainless steel hardware
- Heavy duty reinforced guide post base with PVC covered guide post that are easily adjustable
- Gem remote control with handheld transmitter enables in-water operation of your boat lift

## **Specifications**

Available in seven sizes up to 27,000 pounds.

![Google map of boat lifts in Islamorada FL](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20700%20450'%3E%3C/svg%3E)

# BOAT LIFTS IN ISLAMORADA -   IMM QUALITY BOAT LIFTS

## **Looking for boat lifts in Islamorada, FL?**

![Google map of boat lifts in Islamorada FL](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/04/Islamorada-Florida-Boat-Lifts.png)

An incorporated village in the Florida Keys, Islamorada is an ocean lovers’ paradise that is known as the sport-fishing capital of the world. The area is home to around 6,000 residents but welcomes over 100,000 tourists a year to its beautiful coastal paradise.

Centered around Founders Park, Islamorada offers everything from chartered deep sea fishing trips from the Plantation Yacht Harbor Marina to the area’s countless beaches and nature preserves.

While most of Islamorada’s land is restricted due to its unique geographical properties, there are three primary neighborhoods: Matecumbe, Lower Matecumbe, and Key Colony. No matter which of Islamorada’s beautiful coastal neighborhoods you live in, [IMM Quality Boat Lifts](https://iqboatlifts.com/about/) understands the coastal city’s boatlift needs.

IMM Quality Boat Lifts brings the world’s best boat lifts to Islamorada, FL. IMM Quality Boat Lifts offers [a variety of boat lifts](https://iqboatlifts.com/boats-lifts/) made from marine grade aluminum that are built to last. Backed by more than 35 years of experience in this industry, our patented engineering designs are the most reliable and easy to use boat lifts that you can find. Manufactured locally in our Fort Myers, Florida factory, we are proud to be made in America.

### Order Boat Lifts in Islamorada, FL

While our lifts are shipped around the world, it is always a comfort to know that we can meet the needs of our customers in the Islamorada area. No matter what type of watercraft you own and what shoreline conditions exist at your home, IMM Quality Boat Lifts will build you a lift that perfectly suits your needs. That is why our boat lifts are the preferred choice of discerning customers and have an unsurpassed reputation that speaks for itself.

# BOAT LIFTS IN TAMPA -   IMM QUALITY BOAT LIFTS

### **Looking for Boat Lifts in Tampa, FL?**

![Google map of boat lifts in Tampa, FL](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/10/boat-lifts-tampa-fl.png)

Incorporated as a city in 1865, Tampa has become a major hub for businesses and adventure in the state of Florida. Adventure seekers are drawn from both near and far to experience the thrills of Adventure Island and Busch Gardens. Scuba divers and deep-sea fisherman witness the amazing aquatic life that cannot be seen in other areas of the world.

IMM Quality Boat Lifts is proud to have the ability to fill the needs that Tampa has for building a supported marine infrastructure. Neighborhoods we serve include the Parkland Estates, Culbreath, Sunset Park, Golf View, Beach Park, Palma Ceia, Belmar Gardens and Cory Lake Isles.

## Order Boat Lifts in Tampa, FL

Located in nearby Fort Myers, IMM Quality Boat Lifts is pleased to provide durable aluminum lifts that withstand the test of time for the neighboring Tampa community. With a variety of boatlift options available, [IMM Quality Boat Lifts](https://iqboatlifts.com/about/) offers solutions for both business and personal needs.

Crafted from the best marine-grade materials, our boatlifts are our evidence of the commitment IMM Quality has made to meet the needs of each of our customers. Made in America, each lift can be shipped to locations around the country for our state-of-the-art manufacturing facilities in Fort Myers, FL.

# Boat lifts IN San Francisco -   IMM Quality Boat Lifts

### Looking for Boat Lifts in San Francisco, CA?

![Google map of Boat Lifts in San Francisco CA](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/san-fancisco-ca-boat-lifts-maps.jpg)

San Francisco is characterized by its many culturally rich streetscapes with a mixed use of neighborhoods which residents and visitors can walk to. Nearly all of its beaches are part of the regional Golden Gate National Recreation Area and has over 13 million visitors a year. Regardless of where you live in San Francisco’s beautiful coast, [IMM Quality Boat Lifts](https://iqboatlifts.com/about/) understands the coastal city’s boatlift needs.

IMM Quality Boat Lifts brings [the world’s best boat lifts](https://iqboatlifts.com/boats-lifts/) to San Francisco, CA. IMM Quality Boat Lifts offers a variety of boat lifts made from marine-grade aluminum that are built to last. Backed by more than 40 years of experience in this industry, our patented engineering designs are the most reliable and easy to use boat lifts that you can find.

## Order Boat Lifts in San Francisco, CA

Manufactured locally in our Fort Myers, Florida factory, we are proud to be made in America. While our lifts are shipped around the world, it is always a comfort to know that we can meet the needs of our customers in the San Francisco area. No matter what type of watercraft you own and what shoreline conditions exist at your home, IMM Quality Boat Lifts will build you a lift that perfectly suits your needs.

Our longtime expertise in handling the challenging California environment will ensure that you get the best service you and your family deserve. That is why our boat lifts are the preferred choice of discerning customers and have an unsurpassed reputation that speaks for itself.

## Boat Lifts Overview
[Skip to content](https://iqboatlifts.com/all-about-boat-lifts/#content "Skip to content")

![Learn all about this marine boatlift by IMM Quality](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/08/marine-boatlifts-4.jpg)

# All About Boat Lifts

- [August 31, 2015](https://iqboatlifts.com/2015/08/31/)
- [Boat Lifts](https://iqboatlifts.com/boat-lifts/)

## Why buy a boat lift?

While no one can deny the fact that boat lifts offer waterfront homeowners numerous conveniences, “protecting my investment” remains the number one reason boaters invest in these home improvements.  After all, keeping your most prized possession above tidal fluctuations and well out of harms reach from wind, waves, marine growth, and corrosion from harsh saltwater is critical to the longevity of our vessels.

For waterfront homeowners, it is obvious that storing your boat on a lift offers a huge convenience factor.  For starters, you can forget about fighting the crowds at the launch ramp as well as the numerous headaches that go along with maintaining a trailer.  While tying up is easy, lifting your boat high and dry when not in use is even better!  Not only does the convenience of a boat lift improve your overall boating experience, boat lifts increase the value of your home and help maintain the value of your boat.  Furthermore, boat lifts make it easy to inspect your vessel with great detail; whether it’s for a safety check, routine maintenance or thorough cleaning.  Boat lifts allow you to reach all sides of the hull and visually inspect thru-hull fittings, transducers, trim-tabs and props.  Boat lifts make routine maintenance and docking a breeze.

While purchasing a boat lift may sometimes seem like a hefty investment, in reality, they actually pay for themselves over time.  Go ahead and calculate what it costs to haul-out your boat annually to apply expensive anti-fouling coatings, or the routine maintenance required to keep your trailer functional.  It is an industry fact that applying bottom paint automatically reduces the resale value of your boat by as much as 10-percent.  The bottom line is that boat lifts are relatively maintenance free and make your boating and fishing experiences much more convenient and enjoyable.

**How to select a boat lift?**

Much like the rest of the marine industry, the last decade has seen significant innovation in the boat lift market with more yet to come.  Options now exist to suit nearly every dock configuration, tidal range and type of craft.  While there are a wide range of manufacturers and styles available, if you do your homework you will certainly find the proper boat lift for your particular application.  Manufacturers usually categorize their products by weight capacity.  Other important considerations include the depth of water at the dock, length of your vessel, beam length, type of hull (deep-V/catamaran) and propulsion (inboard/outboard).  It is also important to remember that the dry weight listed for your boat is not your vessel’s total weight.  You must compensate for fuel, water, tackle and gear.  Vessels powered with outboard engines do not generally include the engine(s) weight in the overall displacement, so that must also be added in.

When you begin to investigate your boat lift options, the plethora of choices will likely overwhelm you.  The boat lift choices can be distilled down to a few basic types that you should consider; standard four pile beamed cradle lifts, elevator lifts and boathouse lifts.

The four pile beamed cradle boat lift is currently the most efficient design for a cable drawn lift.  This type of lift was developed a couple of decades ago, and has become the industry standard.  It can be recognized by its parallel upper beams that each contain a motor driven shaft through their length on which four cables are wound.  The cables are connected to the four corners of the boat cradle, which is raised or lowered by clockwise or counter clockwise rotation of the shaft.  Four post lifts out-sell all other lifts combined due to the fact they are less expensive and are easier to maintain and install.  These lifts can be deigned to work with any sized vessel.   The “top beams” of these lifts can be set in a “low-profile” configuration, which allows you to use a covered top beam as a boarding platform for easy access to your boat.

[![Four Pile Beamed Cradle Lift](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/08/Platinum-1024x768.jpg)](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/08/Platinum.jpg) Four Pile Beamed Cradle Lift

Elevator style lifts are another popular option and they are ideal for use on restricted waterfronts where outboard pilings are not allowed, such as on narrow canals, or where the driving of pilings is difficult due to hard bottom conditions.  Elevator lifts can be mounted on seawalls or pilings and in a vertical or inclined position.  Elevator lifts are available with capacities up to 30,000 lbs. and custom designs can accommodate larger vessels if the strength of the underlying dock / seawall structure is adequate.  The only drawback to an elevator lift is a higher price tag than four post lifts.

[![Elevator Lift](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/08/marine-boatlifts-4-1.jpg)](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/08/marine-boatlifts-4-1.jpg) Elevator Lift

For homeowners fortunate enough to have a boathouse, adding a boat lift is a fantastic idea.  Traditionally, boathouse lifts were custom designed for each application where the top beams of a standard boat lift used special riser brackets that supported the boathouse rafters and roofing structure.  If you are considering building a boathouse with this style of boat lift installation, it is important you contact your intended boat lift dealer first to ensure a seamless installation.  As you can imagine, maintenance and repairs to your boat lift could be problematic with a riser bracket style of boathouse installation.  Even worse, if you decided to replace your boat lift, you would have to remove the roof of your boathouse to do so.  That is why the invention of hanger brackets has greatly improved the industry.  The hanger bracket assembly slides over the structural stringer bands of the boathouse.  Once in place, the hanger brackets are fastened to the structural stringer bands using stainless steel bolts that require no drilling of the bands.  The boat lift components hang from the bracket assembly with this style and can be easily maintained, repaired or replaced.  This makes hanger brackets the most effective way to mount a lift inside a new or existing boathouse.

[![Boathouse lift](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/08/land-and-sea-3.jpg)](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/08/land-and-sea-3.jpg) Boathouse lift

## Drive Types

Your next consideration, should be the drive system.  The venerable flat plate was introduced over 40 years ago.  This economical option has the slowest operational speed, it is very noisy, messy and is hampered by its belt drive.  The belt drive requires frequent maintenance and is prone to slippage and breakage.  The chain drive has largely replaced the obsolete flat plate drive.  The chain drive is an economical choice with good operational speed and high shock load durability.  The chain drive does require annual maintenance.  There are many types of gear drives available, but the most common use dual worm gears.  These gear drives are fast, do not require any maintenance, and now are more durable than the flat plate.  The downside is that they are considerably more expensive than flat plate or chain drives.  Another choice is hydraulic drives.  These drives are very fast, but they have been found to be extremely susceptible to saltwater corrosion, prone to hydraulic leaks, are complicated to maintain and they are extremely expensive (generally double the price of a gear driven lift of the same capacity).

[![flat plate](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/08/flat-plate-2-179x300.jpg)](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/08/flat-plate-2.jpg)[![Alumavator Powerhead](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/08/Alumavator-Powerhead-300x225.png)](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/08/Alumavator-Powerhead.png)[![Platinum Powerhead](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/08/Platinum-Powerhead-300x228.png)](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/08/Platinum-Powerhead.png)

                    Flat Plate                                   Chain Drive                                           Direct Gear Drive

The previous styles of drives all rely upon extremely inefficient gearing (or hydraulic pressure) so that they can save money by not having a brake on the lift.  Kind of scary, but it works.  The final type of drive, the cycloidal drive, is different from the rest because it is extremely efficient (greater than 95% for cycloidal drives compared to approximately 35% for the others).  The high efficiency results in very fast lift speeds, even faster than hydraulics, but it requires the use of fail-safe brakes, which adds to the cost of the lift.  Cycloidal drives are also gearless, so they don’t have any gears to grind together, wear down, lose teeth and lock up.  Consequently, cycloidal drives have legendary durability and come with a lifetime guarantee.  Cycloidal drives are also the most powerful drives in the industry.  One manufacturer claims their gear drives are the most powerful in the industry with 8,000 in. / lbs. of torque, but cycloidal drives with 34,000 in. / lbs. of torque are routinely used on boat lifts and cycloidal drives with up to 521,000 in. / lbs. of torque are available to use on mega yacht lifts.  Although they are less expensive than hydraulic drives, the major drawback to cycloidal drive systems is that they are more expensive than the other drive systems.  However, if only the absolute best will do, and you want the fastest, most powerful and durable drive system, the cycloidal drive is the only choice.

[![Cycloidal Drive](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/08/Superlift-powerhead-300x265.png)](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/08/Superlift-powerhead.png) Cycloidal Drive

Finally, you need to consider the other components on the lift to see if they will make your boat lift easier and more convenient to use.  Does the lift use pulley and drive shaft bearings that require lubrication?  Do you really want to climb out onto your cradle and top beams, find the zirk fittings and grease up your drive shaft and pulley bearings every 3 months, or would you rather have a lift with maintenance-free self-lubricating bearings?  Would you rather have a lift that uses cables with fixed ends that can’t be adjusted once installed and must be cut off and repaired during cable replacement?  Or would you prefer a lift with wedge locks that allow for easy adjustment of cable length to level the cradle, adjust the pitch of the boat and make cable replacement easier?  Do you want a lift designed with cable keepers or cable rollers to ensure proper cable winding and extend cable life?  Do you want your top beams made with stepped channel which provides structural support for the drive bearing blocks and eliminates shear loads on the weld?  Or would you prefer your top beams be made from standard C channel with the entire load held up by the weld?  Do you want wood bunks or aluminum bunks?  Does the manufacturer use UV resistant non-marring white vinyl that requires no top-side rivets or do their bunks use black plastic with top-side rivets that can mar and scratch your hull?  Is the lift made from aluminum or galvanized steel?  Due to recent changes in EPA guidelines, the galvanizing compound now scratches off easily and galvanized steel lifts will quickly corrode.  Aluminum will not corrode, but it is more expensive than steel.

[![Bearing blocks](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/08/Bearing-blocks-300x140.png)](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/08/Bearing-blocks.png)[![Stepped vs regular channel](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/08/Stepped-vs-regular-channel-300x165.png)](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/08/Stepped-vs-regular-channel.png)[![Wedgelock](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/08/Wedgelock-300x291.png)](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/08/Wedgelock.png)

## **Conclusion**

All in all, boat lifts are extremely valuable.  They only account for a small percentage of your overall boating expenses, yet they greatly reduce maintenance while simultaneously increasing safety and the value of your property.  If you have any questions, please contact the sales team at IMM Quality Boat Lifts and they can help you choose the right lift for your home.  You’ll be glad you did.

# BOAT LIFTS IN PASCAGOULA -   IMM QUALITY BOAT LIFTS

## **Looking for Boat Lifts in Pascagoula, MS?**

### **![Boat Lifts in Pascagoula, MS](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/07/Boat-Lifts-in-Pascagoula-MS.png)**

A small, quiet gulf town, Pascagoula Mississippi grew to be an industrial powerhouse during the height of the Cold War. With a population of about 26,200, the city is home to Ingalls Shipbuilding, the largest employer in Mississippi. Pascagoula also hosts major industrial centers for the oil and chemicals industries as well. These have helped the local metropolitan area grow to include 382,000 people including the surrounding the cities.

The city itself is host to several lovely neighborhoods bordering the local Krebs lake and Pascagoula River, where residents can enjoy a variety of water sports and recreation. Regardless of where you live on Pascagoula’s beautiful river coast, [IMM Quality Boat Lifts](https://iqboatlifts.com/about/) understands the coastal city’s boatlift needs.

IMM Quality Boat Lifts brings the world’s best boat lifts to Pascagoula, MS. IMM Quality Boat Lifts offers [a variety of boat lifts](https://iqboatlifts.com/boats-lifts/) made from marine grade aluminum that are built to last. Backed by more than 35 years of experience in this industry, our patented engineering designs are the most reliable and easy to use boat lifts that you can find. Manufactured locally in our Fort Myers, Florida factory, we are proud to be made in America.

### Order Boat Lifts in Pascagoula, MS

While our lifts are shipped around the world, it is always a comfort to know that we can meet the needs of our customers in the Pascagoula area. No matter what type of watercraft you own and what shoreline conditions exist at your home, IMM Quality Boat Lifts will build you a lift that perfectly suits your needs. That is why our boat lifts are the preferred choice of discerning customers and have an unsurpassed reputation that speaks for itself.

# BOAT LIFTS IN MARATHON -   IMM QUALITY BOAT LIFTS

## **Looking for Boat Lifts in Marathon, FL?**

![Google map of boat lifts in Marathon FL](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/08/Boat-Lifts-Marathon-FL.png)

A paradise for ocean lovers, Marathon is located on the sparsely populated but well-known Florida Keys. The city is spread out over 13 unique islands that are home to a local population of 8,910 residents. Visitors better be prepared to enjoy the multitude of water related activity that Marathon Key offers: from snorkeling in the barrier reef that surrounds the islands to watching logger head turtles at both Coco Plum beach and Sombrero beach.

Naturally, most houses on the islands have direct access to the water through private boatlifts and personal docks. Regardless of where you live in Marathon’s beautiful coast, [IMM Quality Boat Lifts](https://iqboatlifts.com/about/) understands the coastal city’s boatlift needs.

IMM Quality Boat Lifts brings the world’s best boat lifts to Marathon, FL. IMM Quality Boat Lifts offers [a variety of boat lifts](https://iqboatlifts.com/boats-lifts/) made from marine grade aluminum that are built to last. Backed by more than 35 years of experience in this industry, our patented engineering designs are the most reliable and easy to use boat lifts that you can find. Manufactured locally in our Fort Myers, Florida factory, we are proud to be made in America.

### Order Boat Lifts in Marathon, FL

While our lifts are shipped around the world, it is always a comfort to know that we can meet the needs of our customers in the Marathon Key area. No matter what type of watercraft you own and what shoreline conditions exist at your home, IMM Quality Boat Lifts will build you a lift that perfectly suits your needs. Our home-state expertise in handling the challenging Florida environment will insure that you get the best service that you and your family deserve. That is why our boat lifts are the preferred choice of discerning customers and have an unsurpassed reputation that speaks for itself.

# BOAT LIFTS IN MOBILE -   IMM QUALITY BOAT LIFTS

## **Looking for Boat Lifts in Mobile, AL?**

![Google map of boat lifts in Mobile AL](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/07/Boat-Lifts-in-Mobile-AL.png)

Known as one of Alabama’s most iconic cities, Mobile is a southern cultural gem. Traditionally a port city, the town of almost 200,000 has a rich Mardi Gras tradition that is documented at the Mobile Carnival Museum. Mobile also hosts the WWII-era USS Alabama, which serves as a floating museum that details the city’s deep military tradition.

Located on Mobile Bay, residents can also enjoy all sorts of water sports such as jet skiing, fishing, and boating. Key neighborhoods that have houses with private docks include Venetia and Riverside, where homeowners can enjoy direct water access through the Dog River. Being a southern-grown company, [IMM Quality Boat Lifts](https://iqboatlifts.com/about/) understands the coastal city’s boatlift needs.

IMM Quality Boat Lifts brings the world’s best boat lifts to Mobile, AL. IMM Quality Boat Lifts offers [a variety of boat lifts](https://iqboatlifts.com/boats-lifts/) made from marine grade aluminum that are built to last. Backed by more than 35 years of experience in this industry, our patented engineering designs are the most reliable and easy to use boat lifts that you can find. Manufactured locally in our Fort Myers, Florida factory, we are proud to be made in America.

### Order Boat Lifts in Mobile, AL

While our lifts are shipped around the world, it is always a comfort to know that we can meet the needs of our customers in the Mobile area. No matter what type of watercraft you own and what shoreline conditions exist at your home, IMM Quality Boat Lifts will build you a lift that perfectly suits your needs. That is why our boat lifts are the preferred choice of discerning customers and have an unsurpassed reputation that speaks for itself.

# BOAT LIFTS IN DAPHNE -   IMM QUALITY BOAT LIFTS

## **Looking for Boat Lifts in Daphne, AL?**

### **![Google map of boat lifts in Daphne, AL](https://iqboatlifts.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/07/Boat-Lifts-in-Daphne-AL.png)**

Known as the Jubilee City, Daphne, Alabama is a small city of many surprises, located on Mobile Bay. Once a year, a variety of deep-sea fish and crustaceans swarm the shallow waters off of Daphne, in a widely celebrated event that only occurs in one other place on Earth. Daphne’s unique location has allowed it to benefit from the economic growth of factories located in nearby cities, while enjoying its beautiful local environment through a variety of state and city parks.

Residents can enjoy the bay in neighborhoods by May Day Park and McMillian Bluff, where the nearby houses have long skinny docks reaching deep into the shallow water. Regardless of where you live in Daphne’s beautiful coast, [IMM Quality Boat Lifts](https://iqboatlifts.com/about/) understands the coastal city’s boatlift needs.

IMM Quality Boat Lifts brings the world’s best boat lifts to Daphne, AL. IMM Quality Boat Lifts offers [a variety of boat lifts](https://iqboatlifts.com/boats-lifts/) made from marine grade aluminum that are built to last. Backed by more than 35 years of experience in this industry, our patented engineering designs are the most reliable and easy to use boat lifts that you can find. Manufactured locally in our Fort Myers, Florida factory, we are proud to be Made in America.

### Order Boat Lifts in Daphne, AL

While our lifts are shipped around the world, it is always a comfort to know that we can meet the needs of our customers in the Daphne area. No matter what type of watercraft you own and what shoreline conditions exist at your home, IMM Quality Boat Lifts will build you a lift that perfectly suits your needs. That is why our boat lifts are the preferred choice of discerning customers and have an unsurpassed reputation that speaks for itself.
